anya-e0805n:2004_5: Sambandhatthena pana yuttatthaggahaṇena “bhaṭo rañño putto devadattassā”tiādīsu aññamaññānapekkhesu,
anya-e0805n:2004_6: “devadattassa kaṇhā dantā”tiādīsu ca aññasāpekkhesu ayuttatthatāya samāso na hotīti dīpeti.
anya-e0805n:2007_0: Idha padantarena vā taddhitappaccayehi vā āyādippaccayehi vā ekatthībhūtā yuttatthā nāma,
anya-e0805n:2007_3: Samāsaggahaṇādhikāre pana sati tesaṃgahaṇena vā taddhitāyādippaccayanta vibhattilopo.
anya-e0805n:2010_0: Luttāsu vibhattīsu sarantassa assa yuttatthabhūtassa tividhassapi liṅgassa pakatibhāvo hoti.
anya-e0805n:2011_0: Sakatthavirahenidha samāsassa ca liṅgabhāvābhāvā vibhattuppattiyamasampattāyaṃ nāmabyapadesātidesamāha.
anya-e0805n:2013_1: samāsā ca nāmamiva daṭṭhabbā tavetuna tvāna tvādippaccayante vajjetvā.
anya-e0805n:2013_3: Idha samāsaggahaṇaṃ atthavataṃ samudāyānaṃ nāmabyapadeso samāsassevāti niyamatthanti apare.
anya-e0805n:2016_1: Ettha hi satipi liṅgātidese “adhipañña”ntiādīsu “adhiñāṇaṃ”ntiādi rūpappasaṅgo na hoti saddantarattā,
anya-e0805n:2019_0: Tasmā akārantā abyayībhāvā parāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ kvaci aṃ hoti, sesaṃ neyyaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2027_0: Vicchāyaṃ – attānamattānaṃ pati paccattaṃ, addhamāsaṃ addhamāsaṃ anu anvaddhamāsaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2029_0: Paṭilome – sotassa paṭilomaṃ paṭisotaṃ, paṭipathaṃ, pativātaṃ, attānaṃ adhikicca pavattā ajjhattaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2031_0: Samiddhiyaṃ – bhikkhāya samiddhīti atthe samāseva napuṃsakaliṅgatte ca kate –
anya-e0805n:2034_0: Napuṃsake vattamānassa samāsassa anto saro rasso hoti.
anya-e0805n:2034_2: tena digudvandabahubbīhīsupi napuṃsake vattamānassa samāsantassarassa rassattaṃ siddhaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n:2038_0: Akārantato aññasmā abyayībhāvasamāsā parāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ lopo ca hoti. Adhitti,
anya-e0805n:2044_0: So ca navavidho visesanapubbapado visesanuttarapado visesanobhayapado upamānuttarapado sambhāvanāpubbapado
anya-e0805n:2045_3: mahanto ca so puriso cāti viggahe –
anya-e0805n:2046_0: Ito paraṃ “vibhāsā rukkhatiṇa”iccādito “vibhāsā”ti samāsavidhāne sabbattha vattate.
anya-e0805n:2048_0: Dve padāni nāmikāni tulyādhikaraṇāni aññamaññena saha vibhāsā samasyante,
anya-e0805n:2048_1: tasmiṃ dvipade tulyādhikaraṇe sati so samāso kammadhārayasañño ca hoti.
anya-e0805n:2049_1: tulyaṃ samānaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ attho yassa padadvayassa taṃ tulyādhikaraṇaṃ,
anya-e0805n:2049_3: Bhinnappavattinimittānaṃ dvinnaṃ padānaṃ visesanavisesitabbabhāvena ekasmiṃ atthe pavatti tulyādhikaraṇatā.
anya-e0805n:2049_5: Yathā hi kammaṃ kriyañca payojanañca dvayaṃ dhārayati,
anya-e0805n:2049_8: tathā ayaṃ samāso ekassa atthassa dve nāmāni dhārayati,
anya-e0805n:2049_9: tasmiṃ samāse sati ekatthajotakassa nāmadvayassa sambhavato.
anya-e0805n:2052_0: Mahanta saddassa mahā hoti tulyādhikaraṇe uttarapade pare.
anya-e0805n:2052_2: ettha ca visesanassa pubbanipāto visesanabhūtassa pubbapadassa mahādesavidhānatova viññāyati.
anya-e0805n:2056_1: tappurisasadisattā ayampi samāso anvatthasaññāya tappurisoti vutto.
anya-e0805n:2057_6: Santo ca so puriso cāti sappuriso,
anya-e0805n:2057_7: “santasaddassa so bhe bo cante”ti ettha casaddena santasaddassa samāse abhakārepi sādeso,
anya-e0805n:2058_0: Kvaci vibhāsādhikārato na bhavati, yathā – puṇṇo mantāniputto, citto gahapati, sakko devarājāti.
anya-e0805n:2059_0: Pumā ca so kokilo cāti atthe samāse kate –
anya-e0805n:2062_0: Pumaiccetassa anto akāro lopamāpajjate liṅgādīsu parapadesu samāsesu,
anya-e0805n:2063_0: Khattiyā ca sā kaññā cāti viggayha samāse kate –
anya-e0805n:2064_0: “Tulyādhikaraṇe, pade, itthiyaṃ bhāsitapumitthī pumāva ce”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n:2066_0: Kammadhārayasaññe ca samāse itthiyaṃ vattamāne tulyādhikaraṇe uttarapade pare pubbabhūto itthivācako saddo pubbe bhāsitapumā ce,
anya-e0805n:2066_1: so pumā iva daṭṭhabboti pubbapade itthippaccayassa nivatti hoti.
anya-e0805n:2067_4: brāhmaṇī ca sā dārikā cāti brāhmaṇadārikā,
anya-e0805n:2068_1: tena “khattiyakumārī kumārasamaṇī taruṇabrāhmaṇī”tiādīsu uttarapadesu itthippaccayassa na nivatti hoti.
anya-e0805n:2071_0: Tathā puratthimo ca so kāyo cāti puratthimakāyo,
anya-e0805n:2072_0: Visesanuttarapade jinavacanānuparodhato therācariyapaṇḍitādi visesanaṃ parañca bhavati. Yathā –
anya-e0805n:2072_1: sāriputto ca so thero cāti sāriputtatthero.
anya-e0805n:2072_7: mahosadho ca so paṇḍito cāti mahosadhapaṇḍito.
anya-e0805n:2073_2: siniddho ca so uṇho cāti siniddhuṇho, māso.
anya-e0805n:2073_3: Khañjo ca so khujjo cāti khañjakhujjo.
anya-e0805n:2074_0: Upamānuttarapade abhidhānānurodhato upamānabhūtaṃ visesanaṃ paraṃ bhavati. Yathā –
anya-e0805n:2074_2: muni ca so sīho cāti munisīho.
anya-e0805n:2074_8: saddhammo ca so raṃsi cāti saddhammaraṃsi.
anya-e0805n:2074_11: samaṇo ca so puṇḍarīko cāti samaṇapuṇḍarīko,
anya-e0805n:2077_0: Nanipātapubbapado yathā – na brāhmaṇoti atthe kammadhārayasamāse, vibhattilopādimhi ca kate –
anya-e0805n:2080_0: Nassa nipātapadassa tappurise uttarapade pare sabbasseva attaṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n:2088_0: Tattha yo “asūriyapassā rājadārā”tiādīsu viya uttarapadatthassa sabbathā abhāvaṃ dīpeti,
anya-e0805n:2088_2: Yo pana “abrāhmaṇa amanussā”tiādīsu viya uttarapadatthaṃ pariyudāsitvā taṃsadise vatthumhi kāriyaṃ paṭipādayati,
anya-e0805n:2093_4: yadā te pana aññena sadisādivācakena naiti nipātena yujjanti,
anya-e0805n:2093_7: tasmā uttarapadatthajotakoyevettha naiti nipātoti na doso,
anya-e0805n:2094_0: Aññatthe – na byākatā abyākatā, asaṃkiliṭṭhā, apariyāpannā.
anya-e0805n:2095_0: Viruddhatthe – na kusalā akusalā, kusalapaṭipakkhāti attho. Evaṃ alobho, amitto.
anya-e0805n:2096_0: Pasajjappaṭisedhe – na katvā akatvā, akātuna puññaṃ akaronto.
anya-e0805n:2099_0: Naiccetassa padassa tappurise uttarapade ana hoti sare pare.
anya-e0805n:2101_0: Kupubbapado yathā – kucchitamannanti niccasamāsattā aññapadena viggaho, kammadhārayasamāse kate –
anya-e0805n:2104_0: Kuiccetassa nipātassa tappurise uttarapade kada hoti sare pare. Kadannaṃ. Evaṃ kadasanaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2105_0: Sareti kiṃ? Kudārā, kuputtā, kudāsā, kudiṭṭhi.
anya-e0805n:2108_0: Kuiccetassa appatthe vattamānassa kā hoti tappurise uttarapade pare.
anya-e0805n:2110_1: tesaṃ “nāmānaṃ samāso”ti yogavibhāgena samāso daṭṭhabbo. Yathā –
anya-e0805n:2111_3: kammani diṭṭhā pubbanti diṭṭhapubbā devā tena.
anya-e0805n:2115_0: Tayo lokā samāhaṭā cittena sampiṇḍitā, tiṇṇaṃ lokānaṃ samāhāroti vā atthe –
anya-e0805n:2120_2: Atha vā saṅkhyāpubbattanapuṃsakekattasaṅkhātehi dvīhi lakkhaṇehi gato avagatoti digūti vuccati,
anya-e0805n:2120_3: dvīhi vā lakkhaṇehi gacchati pavattatīti digu.
anya-e0805n:2130_1: tena samāsantagatānaṃ rājādīnaṃ nāmānaṃ anto kvaci akāro hotīti attho.
anya-e0805n:2130_2: Kāraggahaṇena bahubbīhādimhi samāsante kvaci kappaccayo hoti,
anya-e0805n:2130_3: surabhi su du pūtīhi gandhantassikāro ca.
anya-e0805n:2131_0: Atha vā a ca ko ca akā,
anya-e0805n:2131_2: tena kvaci samāsantagatānamanto hutvā a ka iccete paccayā hontīti attho.
anya-e0805n:2131_3: Tena pañca gāvo samāhaṭāti atthe samāsādiṃ katvā samāsante appaccaye,
anya-e0805n:2131_4: “o sare cā”ti avādese ca kate “pañcagava”ntiādi ca sijjhati.
anya-e0805n:2132_1: eko ca so puggalo cāti ekapuggalo.
anya-e0805n:2136_0: So pana dutiyādīsu chasu vibhattīsu bhāvato chabbidho.
anya-e0805n:2140_0: Amādivibhatyantāni yuttatthāni pubbapadāni nāmehi parapadebhi saha vibhāsā samasyante,
anya-e0805n:2143_0: Upapadasamāse pana vuttiyeva tassa niccattā. Yathā –
anya-e0805n:2146_0: Tatiyā kitaka pubba sadisa samūnattha kalaha nipuṇa missasakhilādīhi.
anya-e0805n:2161_0: “Devānaṃ rājā”ti atthe samāsādimhi kate “kvaci samāsantagatānamakāranto”ti akāro,
anya-e0805n:2161_1: tato “syā cā”ti āttaṃ na bhavati. Devarājo, devarājā,
anya-e0805n:2162_0: Pumassa liṅgaṃ pulliṅgaṃ. Evaṃ pumbhāvo, pumantalopādi.
anya-e0805n:2165_1: “Bhaṭo rañño puriso devadattassā”ti ettha “bhaṭasambandhe chaṭṭhī”ti aññamaññānapekkhatāya ayuttatthabhāvato samāso na bhavati,
anya-e0805n:2165_2: “kosalassa rañño putto”tiādīsu pana sāpekkhatāya asamatthattā na bhavati,
anya-e0805n:2165_3: sambandhīsaddānaṃ pana niccaṃ sāpekkhattepi gamakattā samāso, yathā –
anya-e0805n:2167_23: itthīsu dhutto itthidhutto chāyāya sukkho chāyāsukkho,
anya-e0805n:2169_0: Idha na bhavati, bhojane mattaññutā, indriyesu guttadvāratā, āsane nisinno, āsane nisīditabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2171_0: “Tadanuparodhenā”ti vuttattā yathābhidhānaṃ tappurise kvaci accantādīsu amādivibhatyantaṃ pubbapadaṃ paraṃ sambhavati.
anya-e0805n:2175_3: tato “tesaṃ vibhattiyo lopā cā”ti vibhattilope sampatte tattheva caggahaṇena pubbapade vibhattilopābhāvo.
anya-e0805n:2180_3: sahapubbapado upamānapubbapado saṅkhyobhayapado disantarāḷattho byatihāralakkhaṇo cāti.
anya-e0805n:2181_0: Tattha dvipado tulyādhikaraṇo bahubbīhi kammādīsu chasu vibhatyatthesu bhavati.
anya-e0805n:2182_0: Tattha dutiyatthe tāva – “āgatā samaṇā imaṃ saṅghārāma”nti viggahe –
anya-e0805n:2184_0: Samasyamānapadato aññesaṃ paṭhamadutiyādivibhatyantānaṃ padānamatthesu yuttatthāni nāmāni vibhāsā samasyante,
anya-e0805n:2186_1: tesu yattha visesanabhūto attho aññapadatthaggahaṇena gayhati,
anya-e0805n:2187_0: Yattha pana na gayhati, so atagguṇasaṃviññāṇo, yathā – bahudhanamānayāti.
anya-e0805n:2188_0: Idha bahubbīhisadde viya visesanassa pubbanipāto, sesaṃ pubbasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2189_2: samaṇasaddo ca attano atthe aṭṭhatvā dutiyāvibhatyatthabhūte saṅghārāmasaṅkhāte aññapadatthe vattanti,
anya-e0805n:2189_4: tato samāseneva kammatthassa abhihitattā puna dutiyā na hoti.
anya-e0805n:2190_2: paṭipannā addhikā yaṃ pathaṃ soyaṃ paṭipannaddhiko patho,
anya-e0805n:2190_3: abhiruḷhā vāṇijā yaṃ nāvaṃ sā abhiruḷhavāṇijā nāvā.
anya-e0805n:2191_1: jitāni indriyāni yena samaṇena soyaṃ jitindriyo samaṇo.
anya-e0805n:2192_1: dinno suṅko yassa rañño soyaṃ dinnasuṅko rājā,
anya-e0805n:2192_2: upanītaṃ bhojanaṃ assa samaṇassāti upanītabhojano samaṇo,
anya-e0805n:2193_1: niggatā janā asmā gāmā soyaṃ niggatajano gāmo,
anya-e0805n:2194_1: chinnā hatthā yassa purisassa soyaṃ chinnahattho puriso.
anya-e0805n:2194_15: idha parimāṇasaddassa sannidhānato dasasaddo saṅkhyāne vattate,
anya-e0805n:2194_17: ko pabhavo assāti kiṃpabhavo ayaṃ kāyo,
anya-e0805n:2195_0: Chandajātādīsu visesanavisesitabbānaṃ yathicchitattā ubhayaṃ pubbaṃ nipatati, yathā –
anya-e0805n:2199_0: Itthiyaṃ vattamāne tulyādhikaraṇe pade pare pubbe bhāsitapumā itthivācako saddo atthi ce,
anya-e0805n:2199_1: so pumā iva daṭṭhabboti pubbapade itthippaccayābhāvo,
anya-e0805n:2201_0: Kvaci taddhitasamāsanāmopasaggādīsu padesu ādimajjhuttarabhūtānaṃ sarānaṃ jinavacanānuparodhena dīgharassā honti paccayesu,
anya-e0805n:2204_0: Rassattaṃ ajjave itthi- rūpādo ca ka, tādisūti.
anya-e0805n:2205_2: tathā pahūtā jivhā assāti pahūtajivho bhagavā.
anya-e0805n:2207_0: Pubbapadassevāyaṃ pumbhāvātideso, tena idha na bhavati. Bahudāsiko puriso. Bahukumārikaṃ kulaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2212_3: nānādumapatitāni ca tāni pupphāni cāti nānādumapatitapupphāni,
anya-e0805n:2212_5: nānādumapatitapupphavāsitā sānū yassa pabbatassa soyaṃ nānādumapatitapupphavāsitasānu pabbato.
anya-e0805n:2213_3: tādiso kūṭo yassa soyaṃ byālambambudharabinducumbitakūṭo iccādi.
anya-e0805n:2214_1: sampannāni sassāni yasmiṃ janapade soyaṃ sampannasasso janapado,
anya-e0805n:2214_3: Ākiṇṇā manussā yassaṃ rājadhāniyaṃ sā ākiṇṇamanussā rājadhānī,
anya-e0805n:2219_2: samānena janena saddhiṃ vāso assāti samānavāso puriso.
anya-e0805n:2220_1: parakkamenādhigatā sampadā yehi te bhavanti parakkamādhigatasampadā mahāpurisā.
anya-e0805n:2220_3: oṇīto pattato pāṇi yena soyaṃ oṇītapattapāṇi,
anya-e0805n:2220_4: sīhassa pubbaddhaṃ viya kāyo assāti sīhapubbaddhakāyo,
anya-e0805n:2220_5: mattā bahavo mātaṅgā asminti mattabahumātaṅgaṃ vanaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n:2221_2: Idha “attaṃ nassa tappurise”ti sutte “attaṃ nassā”ti yogavibhāgena nassa attaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2221_6: na vijjate vuṭṭhi etthāti avuṭṭhiko janapado,
anya-e0805n:2221_13: na vijjanti āsavā etesanti anāsavā iccādi.
anya-e0805n:2222_6: Evaṃ saha paccayehi vattantīti sappaccayā, sakileso,
anya-e0805n:2223_2: kāyabyāmānaṃ samappamāṇatāya nigrodho iva parimaṇḍalo yo rājakumāro soyaṃnigrodhaparimaṇḍalo rājakumāro.
anya-e0805n:2223_6: cakkhu iva bhūto ayaṃ paramatthadassanatoti cakkhubhūto bhagavā.
anya-e0805n:2223_10: andho viya bhūto ayanti andhabhūto bālo.
anya-e0805n:2224_1: suvaṇṇavaṇṇo viya vaṇṇo yassa soyaṃ suvaṇṇavaṇṇo bhagavā.
anya-e0805n:2224_8: sīhassa pubbaddhaṃ viya assa kāyoti sīhapubbaddhakāyo,
anya-e0805n:2224_9: brahmuno viya aṭṭhaṅgasamannāgato saro assāti brahmassaro.
anya-e0805n:2225_1: dve vā tayo vā pattā dvattipattā,
anya-e0805n:2225_5: cha vā pañca vā vācā chappañcavācā.
anya-e0805n:2226_1: pubbassā ca dakkhiṇassā ca disāya yadantarāḷaṃ sāyaṃ pubbadakkhiṇā vidisā.
anya-e0805n:2226_7: Yadā pana dakkhiṇā ca sā pubbā cāti kammadhārayasamāso hoti,
anya-e0805n:2227_1: kesesu ca kesesu ca gahetvā idaṃ yuddhaṃ pavattatīti kesākesi,
anya-e0805n:2227_2: daṇḍehi ca daṇḍehi ca paharitvā idaṃ yuddhaṃ pavattatīti daṇḍādaṇḍi,
anya-e0805n:2237_1: so pana atthavasena kevalasamuccayo anvācayo itarītarayogo samāhāro cāti catubbidho.
anya-e0805n:2239_2: dvandasadisattā ayaṃ samāsopi anvatthasaññāya dvandoti vuccati,
anya-e0805n:2240_0: Nanu ca ubhayapadatthappadhānatte sati dvande kathamekatthībhāvo siyāti? Vuccate –
anya-e0805n:2240_1: sadisādiatthepi saddappavattisambhavenadvinnaṃ padānaṃ ekakkhaṇeyeva atthadvayadīpakattā na virodho,
anya-e0805n:2240_4: Yathā hi bhūsaddo anubhavaabhibhavādike atthe anvabhiādiupasaggasahitova dīpeti,
anya-e0805n:2240_9: Atha vā dvinnampi yathāvuttasamuccayadīpakattā atthi dvandepekatthitāti na koci virodho,
anya-e0805n:2246_0: Jāyāsaddassa tudaṃ jāniiccete ādesā honti patisadde pare kvaci.
anya-e0805n:2247_3: surā ca asurā ca garuḷā ca manujā ca bhujagā ca gandhabbā ca surāsuragaruḷamanujabhujagagandhabbā.
anya-e0805n:2250_1: “cakkhu ca sotañcā”ti atthe “nāmānaṃ samuccayo dvando”ti dvandasamāsaṃ katvā vibhattilopādimhi kate –
anya-e0805n:2252_0: 359. Tathā dvande pāṇi tūriya yogga senaṅga khuddajantuka vividha viruddha visabhāgatthādīnañca.
anya-e0805n:2253_1: tathā samāhāradvandasamāsepi pāṇi tūriya yogga senaṅgatthānaṃ,
anya-e0805n:2254_0: Pāṇino ca tūriyāni ca yoggāni ca senā cāti pāṇitūriya yoggasenā,
anya-e0805n:2254_3: Khuddā ca te jantukā ceti khuddajantukā,
anya-e0805n:2254_8: vividhā ca te lakkhaṇato sabhāgā ca kiccatoti visabhāgā.
anya-e0805n:2254_9: Pāṇitūriyayoggasenaṅgāni ca khuddajantukā ca vividhaviruddhā ca visabhāgā cāti dvando,
anya-e0805n:2255_0: Ādiggahaṇena aññoññaliṅgavisesita saṅkhyāparimāṇattha pacanacaṇḍālattha disatthādīnañca dvande ekattaṃ,
anya-e0805n:2255_3: napuṃsakaliṅgattañca katvā samāsattā nāmabyapadese kate syādyuppatti amādesādi.
anya-e0805n:2257_4: Saṅkhe ca paṇavo ca ḍiṇḍimo ca,
anya-e0805n:2257_5: saṅkhā ca paṇavā ca ḍaṃṇḍimā cāti vā saṅkhapaṇavaḍiṇḍimaṃ,
anya-e0805n:2258_0: Yoggaṅgatthe yathā – phālo ca pācanañca phālapācanaṃ, yugañca naṅgalañca yuganaṅgalaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2259_0: Senaṅgatthe hatthino ca assā ca hatthiassaṃ,
anya-e0805n:2260_0: Khuddajantukatthe ḍaṃsā ca makasā ca ḍaṃsamakasaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2261_1: ahī ca nakulā cāti vā ahinakulaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2262_10: “Aṃmo niggahītaṃ jhalapehī”ti ettha “aṃmo”ti niddesadassanato katthaci napuṃsakaliṅgattaṃ na hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0805n:2263_0: Aññoññaliṅgavisesitānaṃ dvande dāsī ca dāso ca dāsidāsaṃ,
anya-e0805n:2265_0: Pacanacaṇḍālatthānaṃ dvande orabbhikā ca sūkarikā ca orabbhikasūkarikaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2266_0: Disatthānaṃ dvande pubbā ca aparā cāti atthe dvandasamāsaṃ,
anya-e0805n:2266_2: napuṃsakaliṅgatte ca kate “saro rasso napuṃsake”ti rassattaṃ,
anya-e0805n:2268_0: 360. Vibhāsā rukkha tiṇa pasu dhana dhañña janapadādīnañca.
anya-e0805n:2269_0: Rukkha tiṇa pasu dhana dhañña janapadādīnamekattaṃ,
anya-e0805n:2270_0: Tattha rukkhānaṃ dvande assatthā ca kapitthā cāti atthe samāhāre dvandasamāsādimhi kate iminā vikappenekattaṃ,
anya-e0805n:2271_0: Tiṇānaṃ dvande usīrāni ca bīraṇāni ca usīrabīraṇaṃ,
anya-e0805n:2272_0: Pasūnaṃ dvande ajā ca eḷakā ca ajeḷakaṃ,
anya-e0805n:2272_2: hatthī ca gāvo ca assā ca vaḷavā ca hatthigavassavaḷavaṃ,
anya-e0805n:2274_0: Dhaññānaṃ dvande sālī ca yavā ca sāliyavaṃ, sāliyavā vā. Evaṃ tilamuggamāsaṃ, tilamuggamāsā vā.
anya-e0805n:2275_0: Janapadānaṃ dvande kāsī ca kosalā ca kāsikosalaṃ,
anya-e0805n:2277_0: Sakuṇānaṃ dvande haṃsā ca bakā ca haṃsabakaṃ,
anya-e0805n:2286_0: Digu dudhā tappuriso, aṭṭhadhā navadhā bhave;
anya-e0805n:2292_0: Atha nāmato eva vibhatyantā apaccādiatthavisese taddhituppattīti nāmato paraṃ taddhitavidhānamārabhīyate.
anya-e0805n:2293_0: Tattha tasmā tividhaliṅgato paraṃ hutvā hitā sahitāti taddhitā,
anya-e0805n:2293_2: tesaṃ vā nāmikānaṃ hitā upakārā taddhitāti anvatthabhūtaparasamaññāvasenāpi ṇādippaccayāva taddhitā nāma.
anya-e0805n:2297_0: Chaṭṭhiyantato liṅgamhā ṇappaccayo hoti vikappena “tassa apacca”miccetasmiṃ atthe.
anya-e0805n:2300_1: liṅgehi ca paccayā parāva hontīti paribhāsato apaccatthasambandhiliṅgato chaṭṭhiyantāyeva paro hoti.
anya-e0805n:2304_0: Ādisarassa vā ādibyañjanassa vā asaṃyogantassa vuddhi hoti saṇakārappaccaye pare.
anya-e0805n:2304_4: tadā ca pakatibhūte liṅge sarānamādisarassa asaṃyogantassa vuddhi hoti saṇakāre taddhitappaccaye pareti attho.
anya-e0805n:2311_0: Tesaṃ akāraivaṇṇuvaṇṇānameva yathākkamaṃ ā eoiccete vuddhiyo honti.
anya-e0805n:2311_6: Ā ca e ca o ca āyo.
anya-e0805n:2312_0: Yathā hi katavuddhīnaṃ, puna vuddhi na hotiha;
anya-e0805n:2313_0: Tathā sabhāvavuddhīnaṃ, āyonaṃ puna vuddhi na.
anya-e0805n:2314_2: “naye paraṃ yutte”ti paranayanaṃ katvā taddhitattā “taddhitasamāsa”iccādinā nāmabyapadese kate pure viya syādyuppatti.
anya-e0805n:2315_4: Evaṃ sabbattha gottataddhite paṭhamappakatitoyeva paccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n:2316_0: Itthiyaṃ ṇappaccayantattā “ṇava ṇika ṇeyya ṇa ntūhī”ti vāsiṭṭhasaddato īpaccayo.
anya-e0805n:2316_1: Saralopādiṃ katvā itthippaccayantattā “taddhitasamāsa”iccādisutte caggahaṇena nāmabyapadese kate syādyuppatti,
anya-e0805n:2318_3: Ettha ca ayuvaṇṇattābhāvā ākārādīnaṃ na vuddhi hoti.
anya-e0805n:2319_0: “Vacchassa apacca”nti viggahe ṇamhi sampatte “vā ṇa’pacce”ti ito vāti taddhitavidhāne sabbattha vattate,
anya-e0805n:2321_0: Vaccha kaccaiccevamādito chaṭṭhiyantato gottagaṇato ṇāyana ṇānaiccate paccayā honti vā “tassāpacca”miccetasmiṃ atthe.
anya-e0805n:2325_1: Kattikā vinatārohiṇīiccevamādīhi itthiyaṃ vattamānehi liṅgehi ṇeyyappaccayo hoti vā “tassāpacca”miccetasmiṃ atthe.
anya-e0805n:2329_0: Akārantato liṅgamhā ṇipaccayo hoti vā “tassāpacca”miccetasmiṃ atthe. Dakkhi, dakkhī, dakkhayo,
anya-e0805n:2333_2: “yavataṃ talanadakārānaṃ byañjanāni ca la ña jakāratta”nti tyakārasaṃyogassa cakāro,
anya-e0805n:2337_0: Tesu ādimajjhuttaresu avihitalakkhaṇesu jinavacanānuparodhena kvaci vuddhi lopa āgama vikāra viparītaādesā hontīti saṃyogantattepi ādivuddhi,
anya-e0805n:2340_0: Upagu manuiccevamādīhi ukārantehi gottagaṇehi ṇavappaccayo hoti vā “tassāpacca”miccetasmiṃ atthe.
anya-e0805n:2340_1: Ādisaddassa cettha pakāravācakattā ukārantatoyevāyaṃ. Opagavo, opagavī, opagavaṃ,
anya-e0805n:2347_0: 373. Yena vā saṃsaṭṭhaṃ tarati carati vahati ṇiko.
anya-e0805n:2348_4: tato tatiyantato liṅgamhā tesu saṃsaṭṭhādīsvatthesu ṇikappaccayo hoti vā.
anya-e0805n:2354_6: tamassa jīvikā iccetesvatthesu ca dutiyādivibhatyantehi liṅgehi ṇikappaccayo hoti vā. Venayiko.
anya-e0805n:2358_0: I uiccebhesaṃ ādisarānaṃ asaṃyogantānaṃ mā vuddhi hoti saṇe,
anya-e0805n:2358_1: tatreva vuddhi āgamo hoti ca ṭhāneti ekāravuddhāgamo.
anya-e0805n:2362_8: ettha ca “sasare vāgamo”ti sutte vavatthitavāsaddena paccaye parepi sāgamo,
anya-e0805n:2363_0: Sannidhānatthe sarīre sannidhānā vedanā sārīrikā, sārīrikaṃ dukkhaṃ. Evaṃ mānasikā, mānasikaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2365_0: Sippatthe vīṇāvādanaṃ vīṇā, vīṇā assa sippaṃ veṇiko. Evaṃ pāṇaviko, modiṅgiko, vaṃsiko.
anya-e0805n:2366_0: Bhaṇḍatthe gandho assa bhaṇḍanti gandhiko. Evaṃ teliko, goḷiko, pūviko, paṇṇiko, tambūliko, loṇiko.
anya-e0805n:2368_18: tadassa payojananti evamādiatthe ca ṇikappaccayo hoti. Yathā –
anya-e0805n:2370_0: Vāto assa ābādhoti vātiko. Evaṃ semhiko, pittiko.
anya-e0805n:2376_0: Sambhūtatthe mātito sambhūtaṃ mattikaṃ. Evaṃ pettikaṃ. Upadhitassa payojanaṃ opadhikaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2380_1: “tasse”ti chaṭṭhiyantato “ida”miccetasmiṃ atthe ca aññatthesu ca ṇappaccayo hoti vā.
anya-e0805n:2383_0: “Isissa ida”nti atthe ṇappaccaye kate vuddhimhi sampatte –
anya-e0805n:2386_0: I uiccetesaṃ ādisarānaṃ āttañca hoti saṇakārappaccaye pare,
anya-e0805n:2386_1: casaddena rikārāgamo ca ṭhāneti ikārassa āttaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2389_0: Ārisyaṃ, usabhassa idaṃ āsabhaṃ ṭhānaṃ, āsabhī vācā.
anya-e0805n:2390_14: tamassa parimāṇanti iccevamādīsvatthesu ca ṇappaccayo. Yathā –
anya-e0805n:2391_0: Bhavatthe manasi bhavaṃ mānasaṃ sukhaṃ, sāgamo.
anya-e0805n:2392_13: “Sabbato ko”ti ettha puna sabbatoggahaṇena taddhitatopi kvaci sasarakakārāgamo,
anya-e0805n:2393_0: Janapadanāmesu pana sabbattha bahuvacanameva bhavati. Yathā –
anya-e0805n:2393_12: sindhavako vā, assako, kāliṅgo, pañcālo, sakko,
anya-e0805n:2394_0: Nakkhattayoge kattikāya puṇṇacandayuttāya yutto māso kattiko,
anya-e0805n:2394_1: magasirena candayuttena nakkhattena yutto māso māgasiro.
anya-e0805n:2395_5: udumbarā asmiṃ padese santīti odumbaro deso.
anya-e0805n:2399_0: Jātaiccevamādīnaṃ saddānaṃ atthe ima iyaiccete paccayā honti vā.
anya-e0805n:2402_6: tasmiṃ vā vijjatīti puttimo, puttiyo, vuttiko,
anya-e0805n:2404_9: “osare cā”ti sutte casaddena yappaccaye parepi avādeso.
anya-e0805n:2408_0: Chaṭṭhiyantato “tesaṃ samūho”ti atthe kaṇaṇaiccete paccayā honti.
anya-e0805n:2413_10: Casaddena hitādiatthepi upādānānaṃ hitā upādāniyā iccādi.
anya-e0805n:2419_0: “Abhijjhā assa pakati, abhijjhā assa bahulā”ti vā viggahe –
anya-e0805n:2421_11: Evaṃ potako, kumārako, māṇavako, muduko, ujuko,
anya-e0805n:2427_0: Manato nipphannā manomayā, ayasāpakataṃ ayomayaṃ. Ettha ca “manogaṇādīna”nti vattamāne –
anya-e0805n:2429_0: Etesaṃ manogaṇādīnaṃ anto ottamāpajjate vibhattilope kateti okāro.
anya-e0805n:2435_0: Chaṭṭhiyantato ṇyattatāiccete paccayā honti “tassa bhāvo” iccetasmiṃ atthe,
anya-e0805n:2435_5: “yassa guṇassa hi bhāvā dabbe saddaniveso tadabhidhāneṇyattatādayo”ti.
anya-e0805n:2438_0: “Paṇḍitassa bhāvo paṇḍitya”ntiādīsu “yavataṃ talanadakārānaṃ byañjanāni calañajakāratta”nti tyakārasaṃyogādīnaṃ calañajakārādesā, dvittaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2439_4: Tathā “purisassa bhāvo porisa”ntiādīsu “yavataṃ talanā”disutte kāraggahaṇena yavataṃ sakārakacaṭapavaggānaṃ sakārakacaṭapavaggādesā.
anya-e0805n:2442_0: Ttanapaccaye – puthujjanassa bhāvo puthujjanattanaṃ, vedanattanaṃ, jāyattanaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2449_1: tta tā ca “tassa bhāvo” iccetasmiṃ atthe.
anya-e0805n:2449_7: “o sare cā”ti sutte casaddaggahaṇena ukārassa ca avādeso.
anya-e0805n:2450_1: muduno bhāvo maddavaṃ iccatra “āttañcā”ti ṇamhi ikārukārānaṃ āttaṃ, dvibhāvo,
anya-e0805n:2455_0: “Sabbe ime pāpā ayamimesaṃ visesena pāpo”ti viggahe –
anya-e0805n:2457_0: Visesatthe tara tama isika iya iṭṭhaiccete paccayā honti. Pāpataro, pāpatarā,
anya-e0805n:2457_4: pāpisikaṃ. Pāpiyo, pāpiyā, pāpiyaṃ. Pāpiṭṭho, pāpiṭṭhā,
anya-e0805n:2457_8: Evaṃ paṭutaro, paṭutamo, paṭisiko, paṭiyo, paṭiṭṭho.
anya-e0805n:2457_9: Sabbesaṃ atisayena varo varataro, varatamo, varisiko, variyo, variṭṭho.
anya-e0805n:2458_0: “Sabbe ime vuḍḍhā ayamimesaṃ visesena vuḍḍho”ti atthe iyaiṭṭhappaccayā honti.
anya-e0805n:2460_0: Sabbasseva vuḍḍhasaddassa jo hoti iya iṭṭhaiccetesu paccayesu. Jeyyo, jeṭṭho,
anya-e0805n:2460_1: ettha ca “saralopādi”sutte tuggahaṇena lopamakatvā “sarā sare lopa”nti pubbasare lutte “kvacāsavaṇṇaṃ lutte”ti ekāro.
anya-e0805n:2463_2: Ayañca pasattho ayañca pasattho sabbe ime pasatthā ayamimesaṃ visesena pasatthoti seyyo, seṭṭho, jeyyo, jeṭṭho.
anya-e0805n:2465_0: Sabbasseva antikasaddassa nedādeso hoti iyiṭṭhesu. Visesena antikoti nediyo, nediṭṭho.
anya-e0805n:2467_0: Sabbasseva bāḷhasaddassa sādhādeso hoti iyiṭṭhesu. Visesena bāḷhoti sādhiyo, sādhiṭṭho.
anya-e0805n:2469_0: Sabbassa appasaddassa kaṇa hoti iyiṭṭhesu. Visesena appoti kaṇiyo, kaṇiṭṭho.
anya-e0805n:2472_0: Sabbassa yuvasaddassa kaṇa hoti iyiṭṭhesu. “Tesu vuddhī”tiādinā ṇakārassa nakāro. Kaniyo, kaniṭṭho.
anya-e0805n:2474_0: Vantumantuvī iccetesaṃ paccayānaṃ lopo hoti iyiṭṭhesu.
anya-e0805n:2474_1: Sabbe ime guṇavanto ayamimesaṃ visesena guṇavāti guṇiyo, guṇiṭṭho,
anya-e0805n:2477_0: “Medhā yassa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatī”ti viggahe –
anya-e0805n:2479_1: tasmiṃ vā vijjati” iccetesvatthesu vīpaccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n:2480_0: Caggahaṇena so i lava ālādippaccayā ca. Yathā –
anya-e0805n:2481_0: “Tapo assa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatī”ti viggahe –
anya-e0805n:2485_0: “Daṇḍo assa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatī”ti viggahe –
anya-e0805n:2487_1: daṇḍaiccevamādito avaṇṇantā ika ī iccete paccayā honti “tadassatthi” iccetasmiṃ atthe. Daṇḍiko, daṇḍī, daṇḍino, daṇḍinī.
anya-e0805n:2487_2: Evaṃ māliko, mālī, mālinī, chattiko, chattī, rūpiko, rūpī, kesiko, kesī, saṅghī, ñāṇī,
anya-e0805n:2490_0: “Guṇo assa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatī”ti viggahe –
anya-e0805n:2493_0: “Sati assa atthi, tasmiṃ vā vijjatī”ti viggahe –
anya-e0805n:2496_0: Satiiccevamādīhi avaṇṇantarahitehi paṭhamāvibhatyantehi liṅgehi mantuppaccayo hoti “tadassatthī”ti atthe.
anya-e0805n:2499_0: Āyussa ukāro asa hoti mantumhīti asādeso. Āyasmā,
anya-e0805n:2499_2: Gāvo assa santīti gomā, gomanto, gomatī, gomantī,
anya-e0805n:2507_2: tasmiṃ saṅkhyāpūraṇatthe chaṭṭhiyantato mappaccayo hoti. Pañcamo,
anya-e0805n:2507_8: Evaṃ sattamo, sattamī, sattamā, sattamaṃ, aṭṭhamo, aṭṭhamī, aṭṭhamā, aṭṭhamaṃ, navamo, navamī, navamā, navamaṃ, dasamo, dasamī, dasamā,
anya-e0805n:2510_1: Catunnaṃ pūraṇo catuttho, dvittaṃ, catutthī, catutthā,
anya-e0805n:2510_3: channaṃ pūraṇo chaṭṭho, chaṭṭhī, chaṭṭhā, chaṭṭhaṃ,
anya-e0805n:2513_0: Chassa sakārādeso hoti vā saṅkhyāne. Chāhamassa jīvitaṃ sāhaṃ, chāhaṃ vā, saḷāyatanaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2516_0: Dvitiiccetehi tiyappaccayo hoti saṅkhyāpūraṇatthe. Vipariṇāmena “dvi tiṇṇa”nti vattamāne –
anya-e0805n:2518_2: Evaṃ tiṇṇaṃ pūraṇo tatiyo, tatiyā, tatiyaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2518_5: Dve rattiyo durattaṃ, duvidhaṃ, duvaṅgaṃ, dirattaṃ, diguṇaṃ, digu.
anya-e0805n:2520_0: Tesaṃ catutthadutiyatatiyānaṃ aḍḍhūpapadānaṃ aḍḍhūpapadena saha aḍḍhuḍḍhadivaḍḍhadiyaḍḍhaaḍḍhatiyādesā honti.
anya-e0805n:2524_0: Aḍḍhena catuttho aḍḍhuḍḍho, aḍḍhena dutiyo divaḍḍho, diyaḍḍho, aḍḍhena tatiyo aḍḍhatiyo.
anya-e0805n:2525_1: “ekena adhikā dasā”ti atthe tappurisasamāse vā kate “saṅkhyāne”ti vattamāne “dvekaṭṭhānamākāro vā”ti āttaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2535_0: Ekādito parassa dasassa ante īpaccayo hoti vā pūraṇatthe.
anya-e0805n:2538_0: Ekādasannaṃ pūraṇī ekādasī, aññatra ekādasamo, ekādasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2539_0: Dve ca dasa ca, dvīhi vā adhikā dasāti “dvi dasa”iccatra “vā”ti vattate.
anya-e0805n:2541_2: “tesu vuddhi lopā”dinā tissa teādaso ānavutiyā, terasamo, terasī.
anya-e0805n:2542_1: catūhi vā adhikā dasāti catuddasa iccatra “gaṇane dasassā”ti ca vattamāne “catūpapadassa lopo tuttarapadādi cassa cucopi navā”ti tulopo, cuco ca. Cuddasa, coddasa,
anya-e0805n:2543_2: “tesu vuddhi lopā”dinā pañcasaddassa dasa vīsesu pannapaṇṇaādesāpi,
anya-e0805n:2544_1: chahi vā adhikā dasā”ti samāse kate “chassā”ti vattamāne “dase so niccañcā”ti so,
anya-e0805n:2545_0: Ḷo niccaṃ soḷase dassa, cattālīse ca terase;
anya-e0805n:2547_0: Laḷānamaviseso kvaci, soḷasa. Teḷasa, cattālīsaṃ, cattārīsaṃ. Soḷasamo, soḷasī.
anya-e0805n:2552_0: Dasa ca dasa cāti atthe dvandasamāsaṃ katvā “dasadasā”ti vattabbe “sarūpānamekasesvasaki”nti ekasese kate dasasaddato paṭhamābahuvacanaṃ yo.
anya-e0805n:2553_1: Gaṇane dasassa dviti catu pañca cha satta aṭṭhanavakānaṃ vīti cattāra paññā cha sattāsa navā yosu yonañcī samāsaṃ ṭhiri tītuti.
anya-e0805n:2554_0: Gaṇane dasassa sambandhīnaṃ dvika tika catukka pañcaka chakkasattaka aṭṭhaka navakānaṃ katekasesānaṃ
anya-e0805n:2554_1: yathākkamaṃ vīti cattāra paññā cha satta asa nava iccādesā honti yosu paresu,
anya-e0805n:2554_2: yonañca īsaṃ āsaṃ ṭhi riti īti utiiccete ādesā hontīti dvidasatthavācakassa dasassa vīādeso hoti,
anya-e0805n:2557_0: Tāsaṃ saṅkhyānamante tikārāgamo hoti vā. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo.
anya-e0805n:2561_0: Dasa ca dasa ca dasa cāti “dasa dasa dasā”ti vattabbe ekasese kate “gaṇane dasassā”tiādinā tiīsamādesā,
anya-e0805n:2565_1: yovacanassa ri, ti ca. Sattari, sattati,
anya-e0805n:2566_1: yovacanassa ītiādeso ca. Asīti, ekāsīti, dveasīti, teasīti,
anya-e0805n:2569_0: 415. Dasadasakaṃ sataṃ dasakānaṃ sataṃ sahassañca yomhi.
anya-e0805n:2570_0: Gaṇane pariyāpannassa dasadasakatthavācakassa dasasaddassa sataṃ hoti,
anya-e0805n:2571_0: Satassa dvikanti atthe chaṭṭhītappurisaṃ katvā “sataṃ dvika”nti vattabbe “dvikādīnaṃ taduttarapadānañca
anya-e0805n:2571_1: nipaccante”ti vuttiyaṃ vacanato iminā nipātanena uttarapadassa pubbanipāto,
anya-e0805n:2571_10: Atha vā dve satāni dvisatanti digusamāso.
anya-e0805n:2576_0: Yāsaṃ pana saṅkhyānaṃ aniddiṭṭhanāmadheyyānaṃ yāni rūpāni,
anya-e0805n:2581_2: Evaṃ tikaṃ, catukkaṃ, pañcakaṃ, chakkaṃ, sattakaṃ, aṭṭhakaṃ, navakaṃ, dasakaṃ,
anya-e0805n:2586_0: Ekadvitiiccevamādito gaṇanato sakissa ṭhāne vāratthe kkhattuṃpaccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n:2590_3: Dvīhi vibhāgehi dvidhā, dudhā vā, dvedhā.
anya-e0805n:2590_6: Evaṃ catudhā, pañcadhā, chadhā, sattadhā, aṭṭhadhā, navadhā, dasadhā, satadhā,
anya-e0805n:2591_0: Jjhappaccaye ekadhā karotīti ekajjhaṃ. Evaṃ dvejjhaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2592_2: sabbākārena sabbaso, upāyaso, hetuso, ṭhānaso, yoniso.
anya-e0805n:2597_1: “Kissa ka ve cā”ti ettha casaddena kissa kādeso. Kathaṃ,
anya-e0805n:2597_7: “imassi thaṃ dāniha to dhesu cā”ti imasaddassa ikāro, dvittaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2597_8: Ettha hi kkhattuṃ ādithaṃpariyosānappaccayantānaṃ abyayataddhitattā nāmabyapadesaṃ katvā vibhattimhi kate “sabbāsamāvuso”tiādinā vibhattilopo,
anya-e0805n:2597_9: “kvaci to pañcamyatthe”tiādinā vuttatoādippaccayantā ca idheva abyayataddhite saṅgayhanti.
anya-e0805n:2599_0: Ye saddā lakkhaṇena anupapannā aniddiṭṭhalakkhaṇā akkharādito,
anya-e0805n:2601_0: Imasmā jja siyā kāle, samānāparato jju ca;
anya-e0805n:2602_0: Imasaddassa’kāro ca, samānassa ca so siyā.
anya-e0805n:2612_0: Atha ākhyātavibhattiyo kriyāvācīhi dhātūhi parā vuccante.
anya-e0805n:2617_1: tā pana vattamānā pañcamī sattamī parokkhāhiyyattanī ajjatanī bhavissantī kālātipatti cāti aṭṭhavidhā bhavanti.
anya-e0805n:2618_3: te pana atthavasā dvidhā bhavanti sakammakā,
anya-e0805n:2618_5: Tatra sakammakā ye dhātavokammāpekkhaṃ kriyaṃ vadanti, yathā –
anya-e0805n:2618_9: akammakā ye kammanirapekkhaṃ kriyaṃ vadanti, yathā – acchati, seti,
anya-e0805n:2619_0: Te pana sattavidhā bhavanti vikaraṇappaccayabhedena, kathaṃ?
anya-e0805n:2620_0: Tattha paṭhamaṃ avikaraṇesu bhūvādīsu dhātūsu paṭhamabhūtā akammakā bhūiccetasmā dhātuto tyādayo parā yojīyante.
anya-e0805n:2621_0: Bhūsattāyaṃ, “bhū”iccayaṃ dhātu sattāyamatthe vattate, kriyāsāmaññabhūte bhavane vattateti attho.
anya-e0805n:2624_3: atha vā bhūvā ādī pakārā yesaṃ te bhūvādayo.
anya-e0805n:2629_0: Anekassarassa dhātussa anto kvaci lopo hoti.
anya-e0805n:2630_1: iti anekassarattābhāvā idha dhātvantalopo na hoti.
anya-e0805n:2632_0: 426. Vattamānā tianti, sitha, mima, teante, sevhe, emhe.
anya-e0805n:2633_0: Tyādayo dvādasa vattamānāsaññā hontīti tyādīnaṃ vattamānatthavisayattā vattamānāsaññā.
anya-e0805n:2642_0: Idha pana kālassa atītānāgatapaccuppannāṇattiparikappakālābhipattivasena chadhā bhinnattā “paccuppanne”ti viseseti.
anya-e0805n:2642_1: Taṃ taṃ kāraṇaṃ paṭicca uppanno paccuppanno,
anya-e0805n:2645_1: tassā ṭhānāniyame “dhātuliṅgehi parā paccayā”ti paribhāsato dhātuto paraṃ vattamānappaccaye katvā,
anya-e0805n:2647_0: Atha taddhitānantaraṃ vuccamānānaṃ sabbāsaṃ vattamānādīnaṃ aṭṭhavidhānaṃ vibhattīnaṃ yāni yāni pubbakāni cha padāni,
anya-e0805n:2647_1: tāni tāni atthato aṭṭhacattālīsamattāni parassapadasaññāni hontītiādimhi channaṃ parassapadasaññā,
anya-e0805n:2650_0: Kattarikārake abhidheyye sabbadhātūhi parassapadaṃ hotīti parassapadaṃ katvā,
anya-e0805n:2653_0: Tāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ parassapadāna’mattanopadānañca dve dve vacanāni yathākkamaṃ paṭhamamajjhimuttamapurisasaññāni honti.
anya-e0805n:2653_9: Evaṃ aṭṭhavibhattivasena channavutividhe ākhyātapade dvattiṃsa dvattiṃsa paṭhamamajjhimauttamapurisā
anya-e0805n:2655_0: Tumhāmhasaddavajjite tulyādhikaraṇabhūte sādhakavācake nāmamhi payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi dhātūhi paṭhamapuriso hotīti paṭhamapurisaṃ katvā,
anya-e0805n:2655_1: tassāpyaniyamappasaṅge kriyāsādhakassa kattuno ekatte vattumicchite “ekamhi vattabbe ekavacana”nti vattamānaparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṃ ti.
anya-e0805n:2656_2: “yathā kattari cā”ti ito “kattarī”ti vikaraṇappaccayavidhāne sabbattha vattate.
anya-e0805n:2658_0: Bhūiccevamādito dhātugaṇato paro apaccayo hoti kattari vihitesu vibhattippaccayesu paresu.
anya-e0805n:2661_0: Kāritato aññesu paccayesu asaṃyogantānaṃ dhātūnaṃ vuddhi hoti.
anya-e0805n:2661_2: Ettha ca “ghaṭādīnaṃ vā”ti ito vāsaddo anuvattetabbo,
anya-e0805n:2664_0: Yuvaṇṇānampi ya ṇu ṇā-nāniṭṭhādīsu vuddhi na;
anya-e0805n:2669_0: Okārassa dhātvantassa sare pare avādeso hoti.
anya-e0805n:2669_1: “Saralopo mādesa”iccādinā saralopādimhi kate “naye paraṃ yutte”ti paranayanaṃ kātabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2670_0: So puriso sādhu bhavati, sā kaññā sādhu bhavati, taṃ cittaṃ sādhu bhavati.
anya-e0805n:2674_0: Satipi kriyāyekatte kattūnaṃ bahuttā “bahumhi vattabbe bahuvacana”nti vattamānaparassapadapaṭhamapurisabahuvacanaṃ anti,
anya-e0805n:2677_0: Tulyādhikaraṇabhūte tumhasadde payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi dhātūhi majjhimapuriso hotīti vattamānaparassapadamajjhimapurisekavacanaṃsi,
anya-e0805n:2681_0: Tulyādhikaraṇabhūte amhasadde payujjamānepi appayujjamānepi dhātūhi uttamapuriso hotīti vattamānaparassapadauttamapurisekavacanaṃ mi,
anya-e0805n:2683_0: Akāro dīghamāpajjate himimaiccetāsu vibhattīsu. Ahaṃ bhavāmi, mayaṃ bhavāma. Bhavāmi, bhavāma.
anya-e0805n:2686_0: Sabbāsaṃ vattamānānaṃ aṭṭhavidhānaṃ vibhattīnaṃ yāni yāni parāni cha padāni,
anya-e0805n:2686_1: tāni tāni attanopadasaññāni hontīti teādīnaṃ attanopadasaññā.
anya-e0805n:2689_0: Kattari ca kārake abhidheyye dhātūhi attanopadāni honti.
anya-e0805n:2689_2: sesaṃ parassapade vuttanayeneva veditabbaṃ. Bhavate, bhavante, bhavase, bhavavhe, bhave, bhavāmhe.
anya-e0805n:2690_4: So devadatto odanaṃ pacati, pacanti, pacasi, pacatha, pacāmi, pacāma,
anya-e0805n:2693_2: majjhimuttamānaṃ tiṇṇaṃ vā purisānaṃ ekatobhidhāne kātabbe paro puriso yojetabbo.
anya-e0805n:2693_5: tvañca pacasīti pariyāyappasaṅge tumhe pacathāti bhavati.
anya-e0805n:2694_3: ahaṃ paciṃ” ettha bhinnakālattā “mayaṃ pacimhā”ti na bhavati.
anya-e0805n:2695_0: Gamu sappa gatimhi, pure viya dhātusaññāyaṃ dhātvantalopo.
anya-e0805n:2698_0: Gamuiccetassa dhātussanto makāro ccho hoti vā sabbāsu vibhattīsu,
anya-e0805n:2699_0: Vidhiṃ niccañca vāsaddo, māna’ntesu tu kattari;
anya-e0805n:2701_3: “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā garupubbarassato parassa paṭhamapurisabahuvacanassa re vā hoti, gacchare.
anya-e0805n:2702_0: Cchādesābhāve “lopañcettamakāro”ti appaccayassa ekāro. Gameti, gamenti, saralopo. Gamesi, gametha. Gamemi, gamema.
anya-e0805n:2703_0: Attanopadepi so gāmaṃ gacchate, gacchante, gacchare. Gacchase, gacchavhe. Gacche, gacchāmhe.
anya-e0805n:2704_0: “Kuto nu tvaṃ āgacchasi, rājagahato āgacchāmī”tiādīsu pana paccuppannasamīpe vattamānavacanaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2707_0: Gamuiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa ghammādeso hoti vā. Ghammati, ghammanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n:2710_0: Bhāve ca kammani ca kārake abhidheyye attanopadāni honti,
anya-e0805n:2710_3: so ca kārakantarena asaṃsaṭṭho kevalo bhavanalavanādiko dhātvattho.
anya-e0805n:2710_6: tasmā kammani anupubbā bhūdhātuto vattamānattanopadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṃ te.
anya-e0805n:2713_2: “aññesu cā”ti sutte anuvattitavāggahaṇena yappaccaye vuddhi na bhavati,
anya-e0805n:2722_0: Pacadhātuto kammani attanopade yappaccaye ca kate –
anya-e0805n:2725_0: Tassa bhāvakammavisayassa yappaccayassa cavaggayakāravakārattaṃ hoti dhātvantena saha yathāsambhavaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2725_1: Ettha ca “ivaṇṇāgamo vā”ti ito sīhagatiyā vāsaddo anuvattetabbo,
anya-e0805n:2726_0: Cavaggo ca ta vaggānaṃ, dhātvantānaṃ yavattanaṃ;
anya-e0805n:2728_0: Dhātvantassa cavaggādittā cakāre kate “paradvebhāvo ṭhāne”ti cakārassa dvittaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2728_2: “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā garupubbarassato parassa paṭhamapurisabahuvacanassa kvaci re hoti. Paccare, paccante. Paccase, paccavhe. Pacce, paccāmhe.
anya-e0805n:2729_0: Parassapadādese paccati, paccanti. Paccasi, paccatha. Paccāmi, paccāma.
anya-e0805n:2729_1: Tathā kammakattari paccate odano sayameva, paccante. Paccati,
anya-e0805n:2730_0: Gamito kammani attanopade, yappaccaye ca kate –
anya-e0805n:2733_0: Sabbehi dhātūhi tasmiṃ bhāvakammavisaye yappaccaye pare ivaṇṇāgamo hoti vāti īkārāgamo.
anya-e0805n:2737_1: tena kaṭapavaggayakāralasanteheva dhātūhi paro yappaccayo pubbarūpamāpajjate vāti makārā parassa yakārassa makāro. Gammate, gamīyate, gammante,
anya-e0805n:2740_0: 450. Pañcamī tu antu, hi tha, mi ma, taṃ antaṃ, ssuvho, e āmase.
anya-e0805n:2743_0: Āṇatyatthe ca āsīsatthe anuttakāle pañcamīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n:2744_0: Satipi kālādhikāre puna kālaggahaṇena vidhinimantanājjhesanānumatipatthanāpattakālādīsu ca pañcamī.
anya-e0805n:2744_3: so ca iṭṭhassa asampattassa atthassa patthanaṃ,
anya-e0805n:2751_0: Āṇattiyaṃ kattari devadatto dāni odanaṃ pacatu, pacantu. Paca, pacāhi, pacatha. Pacāmi, pacāma. Pacataṃ, pacantaṃ. Pacassu, pacavho. Pace, pacāmase.
anya-e0805n:2752_4: Parassapadatte paccatu, paccantu. Pacca, paccāhi, paccatha. Paccāmi, paccāma.
anya-e0805n:2753_2: gacchatha. Gacchāmi, gacchāma. Gametu, gamentu. Gama, gamāhi, gametha. Gamemi, gamema.
anya-e0805n:2754_0: Kammani gacchīyataṃ, gacchīyatu, gamīyataṃ, gamīyatu, gammataṃ, gammatu iccādi.
anya-e0805n:2755_0: Vidhimhi idha pabbato hotu, ayaṃ pāsādo suvaṇṇamayo hotūtiādi.
anya-e0805n:2756_0: Nimantane adhivāsetu me bhante bhagavā bhojanaṃ, idha nisīdatu bhavaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2758_0: Anumatiyaṃ pucchatu bhavaṃ pañhaṃ, pavisatu bhavaṃ, ettha nisīdatu.
anya-e0805n:2759_0: Patthanā yācanā, dadāhi me gāmavarāni pañca, ekaṃ me nayanaṃ dehi.
anya-e0805n:2760_0: Pattakāle sampatto te kālo kaṭakaraṇe, kaṭaṃ karotu bhavaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n:2762_0: 453. Sattamī eyya eyyuṃ, eyyāsi eyyātha, eyyāmieyyāma, etha eraṃ, etho eyyāvho, eyyaṃeyyāmhe.
anya-e0805n:2766_0: Anumatyatthe ca parikappatthe ca anuttakāle sattamīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n:2768_2: “kvaci dhātu vibhattī”tiādinā eyya eyyāsi eyyāmi eyyaṃiccetesaṃ vikappena ekārādeso.
anya-e0805n:2768_3: So dāni kiṃ nu kho bhave,
anya-e0805n:2769_0: Patthane tu ahaṃ sukhī bhave, buddho bhaveyyaṃ, bhaveyyāmhe.
anya-e0805n:2771_0: Vidhimhi so odanaṃ pace, paceyya, paceyyuṃ.
anya-e0805n:2773_8: gaccheyyāma. Game, gameyya, gamuṃ, gameyyuṃ. Game,
anya-e0805n:2777_0: 455. Hiyyattanī āū, ottha, aṃmhā, tthatthuṃ, sevhaṃ, iṃmhase.
anya-e0805n:2781_0: Hiyyopabhuti atīte kāle paccakkhe vā appaccakkhe vā hiyyattanīvibhatti hotīti hiyyattanīparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṃ ā.
anya-e0805n:2784_0: Kvaci dhātūnamādimhi akārāgamo hoti hiyyattanīajjatanīkālātipattiiccetāsu tīsu vibhattīsu.
anya-e0805n:2790_0: Tathā so odanaṃ apacā, pacā, apacū, pacū. Apaco, paco,
anya-e0805n:2790_1: apacattha, pacattha. Apacaṃ, pacaṃ, apacamhā, pacamhā.
anya-e0805n:2796_0: Hiyyattanādayo catasso vibhattiyo sabbadhātukasaññā hontīti hiyyattanādīnaṃ sabbadhātukasaññattā “ikārāgamo
anya-e0805n:2798_0: 459. Parokkhā a u, e ttha, aṃ mha, ttha re, tho vho, iṃmhe.
anya-e0805n:2801_0: Apaccakkhe vattuno indriyāvisayabhūte atīte kāle parokkhāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n:2806_0: Kha cha sesu parokkhāyaṃ, dvebhāvo sabbadhātunaṃ;
anya-e0805n:2810_0: Dvebhūtassa dhātussa yo pubbo avayavo, so abbhāsasañño hotīti abbhāsasaññā.
anya-e0805n:2813_0: Abbhāsassa antassa ivaṇṇo hoti vā, akāro ca. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo. Tena –
anya-e0805n:2820_0: Abbhāsagatānaṃ dutiyacatutthānaṃ vaggabyañjanānaṃ yathākkamaṃ paṭhamatatiyā hontīti bhakārassa bakāro.
anya-e0805n:2822_0: Brūbhūiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ āhabhūvaiccete ādesā honti parokkhāvibhattiyanti bhūsaddassa bhūvaādeso,
anya-e0805n:2825_0: Sabbasmiṃ asabbadhātukamhi pare kvaci dhātūhi paro ikārāgamo hoti.
anya-e0805n:2828_0: Ettha ca “na sabbadhātukaṃ asabbadhātuka”miti katvā “hiyyattanī sattamī pañcamī vattamānā sabbadhātuka”nti
anya-e0805n:2828_1: hiyyattanīādīnaṃ sabbadhātukasaññāya vuttattā tadaññā catasso vibhattiyo asabbadhātukanti vuccati.
anya-e0805n:2830_2: yappaccayassa asabbadhātukamhi “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā lope kate ivaṇṇāgamo na bhavati,
anya-e0805n:2832_0: Kammani papaccittha, papaccire iccādi. Tathā apacca, apaccū iccādi.
anya-e0805n:2836_0: Abbhāse vattamānassa kavaggassa cavaggo hotīti vakārassa jakāro,
anya-e0805n:2839_0: 468. Ajjatanī ī uṃ, o ttha, iṃ mhā, ā ū, se vhaṃ, amhe.
anya-e0805n:2843_0: Samīpe samīpato paṭṭhāya ajjappabhuti atīte kāle paccakkhe ca apaccakkhe ca ajjatanīvibhatti hotīti ajjatanīparassapadapaṭhamapurisekavacanaṃ ī.
anya-e0805n:2847_0: Sabbehi dhātūhi uṃvibhattissa iṃsvādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0805n:2848_3: Tvaṃ abhavi, bhavi vā, abhavo, bhavo vā,
anya-e0805n:2848_14: bhavittha vā, abhavā, bhavā vā, abhavū, bhavū vā. Abhavise,
anya-e0805n:2850_0: So apaci, paci, apacī, pacī vā,
anya-e0805n:2850_2: Tvaṃ apaci, paci, apaco, paco vā,
anya-e0805n:2850_7: So apacittha, pacittha, apacā, pacā vā, apacū, pacū. Apacise,
anya-e0805n:2850_8: apacivhaṃ. Apacaṃ, pacaṃ, apaca, paca vā, apacimhe, pacimhe.
anya-e0805n:2851_2: Parassapadatte apacci, pacci, apaccī, paccī vā,
anya-e0805n:2851_3: apacciṃsu, pacciṃsu, apaccuṃ, paccuṃ. Apacci, pacci, apacco, pacco vā,
anya-e0805n:2853_0: “Kvaci dhātū”tiādinā ajjatanimhi gamissa cchassa kvaci ñchādeso, agañchi, gañchi, agañchī,
anya-e0805n:2854_0: Cchādesābhāve so agami, gami, agamī, gamī vā,
anya-e0805n:2854_2: “sattamajjatanimhī”ti yogavibhāgena vā sāgame “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā byañjanato ākārāgamo, agamāsi,
anya-e0805n:2854_4: ucāgamo tthamhesu kvaci, agamiṃsu, gamiṃsu, agamaṃsu, gamaṃsu, agamuṃ, gamuṃ,
anya-e0805n:2854_5: tvaṃ agami, gami, agamo, gamo vā,
anya-e0805n:2854_8: Ahaṃ agamiṃ, gamiṃ, agamimha, gamimha, agamumha, gamumha, agamimhā,
anya-e0805n:2856_4: Cchādesābhāve so agamittha, gamittha, agamā, gamā, te agamū, gamū, ajjhagū, agū.
anya-e0805n:2860_4: mā bhavissatīti vā atthe hiyyattanajjatanīpañcamī vibhattiyo,
anya-e0805n:2860_7: mā te bhavantvantarāyā. Mā pacā, mā pacī,
anya-e0805n:2860_12: Mā kañci pāpamāgamā, mā agami, mā gamā, mā gamī,
anya-e0805n:2862_0: 472. Bhavissantī ssati ssanti, ssasi ssatha, ssāmissāma, ssate ssante, ssase ssavhe, ssaṃssāmhe.
anya-e0805n:2876_0: 484. Kālātipatti ssā ssaṃsu, sse ssatha, ssaṃssāmhā, ssatha ssisu, ssase ssavhe, ssiṃssāmhase.
anya-e0805n:2879_3: Ettha ca kiñcāpi na kriyā atītasaddena voharitabbā,
anya-e0805n:2879_4: tathāpi takkiriyuppattippaṭibandhakarakriyāya kālabhedena atītavohāro labbhatevāti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n:2883_0: Tathā so ce taṃ dhanaṃ alabhissa,
anya-e0805n:2892_0: Isu icchākantīsu, pure viya dhātvantalopo, tyādyuppatti, appaccayo ca.
anya-e0805n:2895_0: Isuyamuiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ anto ccho hoti vā.
anya-e0805n:2895_3: So saggaṃ icchati, icchanti. Icchasi, icchatha. Icchāmi, icchāma.
anya-e0805n:2896_5: Parokkhāhiyyattanīsu pana rūpāni sabbattha payogamanugamma payojetabbāni, icchi, esi.
anya-e0805n:2899_2: rassattaṃ. Acchati, acchanti. Acchasi, acchatha. Acchāmi, acchāma.
anya-e0805n:2899_5: upāsīyati. Acchatu, upāsatu. Accheyya, upāseyya. Acchī, upāsī.
anya-e0805n:2900_0: Labha lābhe, labhati, labhanti. Labhasi, labhatha. Labhāmi, labhāma. Labhate, labhante. Labhase, labhavhe. Labhe, labhāmhe.
anya-e0805n:2901_0: Kamme yakārassa pubbarūpatte kate “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā purimabhakārassa bakāro, labbhate,
anya-e0805n:2904_0: Labhaiccetasmā dhātuto paresaṃ īiṃnaṃ vibhattīnaṃ ttha tthaṃiccete ādesā honti vā,
anya-e0805n:2904_1: dhātvantassa lopo ca. Alattha, alabhi, labhi,
anya-e0805n:2904_2: alabhiṃsu, labhiṃsu. Alabho, labho, alabhi, labhi,
anya-e0805n:2905_0: Bhavissantimhi “karassa sappaccayassa kāho”ti ettha sappaccayaggahaṇena vaca muca bhujādito ssassakhādeso,
anya-e0805n:2905_1: vasa chida labhādito chādeso ca vā hotīti ssassa chādeso,
anya-e0805n:2905_2: “byañjanantassa co chappaccayesu cā”ti dhātvantassa cakāro, lacchati,
anya-e0805n:2906_0: Vaca viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, vacati, vacanti. Vacasi, vacatha. Vacāmi, vacāma.
anya-e0805n:2909_0: Vaca vasa vahaiccevamādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ vakārassa ukāro hoti yappaccaye pare,
anya-e0805n:2909_2: “Vassa a va”iti samāsena dutiyañcettha vaggahaṇaṃ icchitabbaṃ,
anya-e0805n:2909_5: “Tassa cavagga”iccādinā sadhātvantassa yakārassa cakāro, dvittaṃ. Uccate, uccante. Vuccate, vuccante. Vuccati,
anya-e0805n:2909_7: Tathā vacatu, vuccatu. Vaceyya, vucceyya. Avacā, avaccā, avacū, avaccū. Avaca, avaco,
anya-e0805n:2911_0: Vacaiccetassa dhātussa akāro ottamāpajjate ajjatanimhi vibhattimhi. Avoci, avocuṃ. Avoco,
anya-e0805n:2912_1: “byañjanantassā”ti vattamāne “ko khe cā”ti dhātvantassa kādeso, vakkhati,
anya-e0805n:2914_0: Kamme uttaṃ, pubbarūpattañca vussati, vussanti iccādi. Vasatu. Vaseyya. Avasi, vasi.
anya-e0805n:2916_0: Tathā ruda assuvimocane, rodati, rucchati. Rodissati iccādi.
anya-e0805n:2917_0: Kusa akkose, āpubbo dvittarassattāni, appaccayavuddhiyo ca. Akkosati. Akkosatu. Akkoseyya.
anya-e0805n:2920_0: Kusa iccetasmā dhātuto īvibhattissa cchiādeso hoti,
anya-e0805n:2925_5: “vacavasa”iccādinā uttaṃ. Vuyhati, vulhati, vuyhanti. Vahatu, vuyhatu. Vaheyya, vuyheyya. Avahī,
anya-e0805n:2928_0: Jaramara iccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ jīrajīyyamīyyādesā honti vā,
anya-e0805n:2928_2: “Kvacā”disuttena ekayakārassa kvaci lopo hoti. Jīyati, jīyanti.
anya-e0805n:2929_3: jīyiyyanti. Jīratu, jīyyatu. Jīreyya, jīyyeyya. Ajīrī, jīrī, jīyyī.
anya-e0805n:2930_0: Mara pāṇacāge, mīyyādeso, mīyyati, mīyyanti. Mīyati, mīyanti vā. Marati, maranti iccādi.
anya-e0805n:2933_0: Disaiccetassa dhātussa passa dissa dakkhaiccete ādesā honti vā.
anya-e0805n:2933_2: tena dissādeso kammani sabbadhātuke eva. Passati, passanti. Dakkhati,
anya-e0805n:2934_0: Kammani yakāralopo, dissate, dissante. Dissati, dissanti.
anya-e0805n:2935_0: Hiyyattaniyaṃ “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā dhātuikārassa attaṃ, addasā, addasa. Kammani adissa.
anya-e0805n:2941_0: Sadaiccetassa dhātussa sīdādeso hoti sabbattha vibhattippaccayesu kvaci.
anya-e0805n:2941_5: deso na bhavati. Nisīdatu. Nisīde. Nisīdi.
anya-e0805n:2945_0: Yajaiccetassa dhātussa ādissa yakārassa ikārādeso hoti yappaccaye pare, saralopo.
anya-e0805n:2945_2: Tathā yajatu, ijjataṃ. Yaje, ijjetha. Yaji, ijjittha.
anya-e0805n:2946_0: Vada viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, tyādyuppatti, appaccayo ca.
anya-e0805n:2949_0: Vadaiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa vajjādeso hoti vā sabbāsu vibhattīsu.
anya-e0805n:2955_0: Appaccayassa ekāro, saralopādi, vajjeti, vadeti, vadati, antimhi –
anya-e0805n:2957_1: kitake ca avihitalakkhaṇesu payogesu kvaci dhātūnaṃ,
anya-e0805n:2957_3: dhātuvihitappaccayānañca dīghatabbiparītaādesalopāgamaiccetāni kāriyāni jinavacanānurūpato bhavanti. Tattha –
anya-e0805n:2959_0: Āyūnaṃ vā vibhattīnaṃ, mhā, ssāntassa ca rassatā.
anya-e0805n:2960_0: Gamito cchassa ñcho vāssa, gamissajjatanimhi gā;
anya-e0805n:2961_0: Ucāgamo vā tthamhesu, dhātūnaṃ yamhi dīghatā.
anya-e0805n:2963_0: Okārā attamittañca, ātthā papponti vā tthathe.
anya-e0805n:2964_0: Tathā brūtoti antīnaṃ, au vāha ca dhātuyā;
anya-e0805n:2968_0: Ekārato parassa antiakārassa lopo, vajjenti, vadenti, vadanti. Vajjesi, vadesi, vadasi, vajjetha, vadetha, vadatha. Vajjemi, vajjāmi, vademi, vadāmi, vajjema, vadema, vajjāma, vadāma.
anya-e0805n:2969_2: Vadīyati vā. Vajjetu, vadetu, vadatu. Vajje, vajjeyya, vade, vadeyya,
anya-e0805n:2976_2: e”ti ca adhikicca “te āvāyā”ti yogavibhāgena akāritepi ekārassa āyādeso, jhāyati,
anya-e0805n:2978_2: “aññesu cā”ti etthānuvattita vāggahaṇena tudādīnaṃ vuddhiabhāvova viseso, tudati, tudanti. Tudasi, tudatha. Tudāmi, tudāma.
anya-e0805n:2979_0: Kamme “tassa cavagga”iccādinā sadakārassa yappaccayassa jakāro dvittaṃ, tujjate, tujjante. Tujjati, tujjanti,
anya-e0805n:2979_2: Tathā tudatu, tudantu. Tude, tudeyya, tudeyyuṃ. Atudi, tudiṃsu. Atudi,
anya-e0805n:2980_0: Visa pavesane papubbo, so gāmaṃ pavisati, pavisanti. Pavisasi, pavisatha. Pavisāmi, pavisāma.
anya-e0805n:2988_4: “aññesu cā”ti vuddhi. So hoti, te honti,
anya-e0805n:2988_5: “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā parasarassa lopo. Hosi, hotha. Homi, homa.
anya-e0805n:2989_0: Tathā hotu, hontu. Hohi, anakāraparattā hilopo na bhavati, hotha. Homi, homa. Bhāve hūyataṃ.
anya-e0805n:2990_0: Sattamiyaṃ saralopādi, heyya, heyyuṃ. Heyyāsi, heyyātha. Heyyāmi, heyyāma. Heyyaṃ vā. Bhāve hūyetha.
anya-e0805n:2991_0: Hiyyattaniyaṃ appaccayalope “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā hūdhātussa ūkārassa uvādeso. Ahuvā, ahuvu, ahuvū. Ahuva, ahuvo,
anya-e0805n:2992_0: Ajjatanimhi “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā hūto īvibhattissa lopo rassattaṃ, so ahu,
anya-e0805n:2992_1: lopābhāve “karassa kāsattamajjatanimhī”ti ettha “sattamajjatanimhī”ti yogavibhāgena sāgamo, vuddhi, ahosi, ahesuṃ,
anya-e0805n:2993_0: “Hi lopaṃ vā”ti ito “lopo, vā”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n:2995_0: Hūiccetassa dhātussa saro eha oha ettamāpajjate bhavissantimhi vibhattimhi,
anya-e0805n:2996_0: Hehiti, hehinti. Hehisi, hehitha. Hehāmi, hehāma.
anya-e0805n:2996_7: hehissāma. Ohādese – hohiti, hohinti. Hohisi, hohitha. Hohāmi, hohāma.
anya-e0805n:2996_14: Ekārādese – heti, henti. Hesi, hetha. Hemi, hema. Hessati, hessanti. Hessasi, hessatha. Hessāmi, hessāma.
anya-e0805n:3000_0: Sī saye appaccayalopo, vuddhi ca, seti, senti. Sesi, setha. Semi, sema. Sete, sente iccādi.
anya-e0805n:3004_0: Ekārassa dhātvantassa sare pare ayādeso hoti,
anya-e0805n:3004_1: saralopādi. Sayati, sayanti. Sayasi, sayatha. Sayāmi, sayāma.
anya-e0805n:3006_0: Tathā setu, sentu. Sehi, setha. Semi, sema. Sayatu, sayantu. Saya, sayāhi, sayatha. Sayāmi, sayāma. Sayataṃ, sayantaṃ. Sayassu, sayavho. Saye, sayāmase.
anya-e0805n:3007_0: Saye, sayeyya, sayeyyuṃ. Atisīyeyya. Bhāve sīyetha.
anya-e0805n:3011_2: ajaṃ gāmaṃ neti, nenti. Nesi, netha. Nemi, nema.
anya-e0805n:3011_5: Kamme nīyate gāmaṃ ajo devadattena, nīyare, nīyante. Nīyati, nīyanti.
anya-e0805n:3012_0: Tathā netu, nayatu. Nīyataṃ, nīyantaṃ. Naye, nayeyya. Nīyetha, nīyeyya. Anayi, nayi, anayiṃsu, nayiṃsu. Vinesi, vinesuṃ.
anya-e0805n:3015_4: Lopābhāve “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā ṭhāto hakārāgamo ca rassattaṃ,
anya-e0805n:3017_0: 493. Yamhi dādhā mā ṭhā hā pā maha mathādīnamī.
anya-e0805n:3018_0: Bhāvakammavisaye yamhi paccaye pare dā dhā mā ṭhā hāpā maha matha iccevamādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ anto īkāramāpajjate,
anya-e0805n:3022_0: Pāiccetassa dhātussa pibādeso hoti vā. Vavatthitavibhāsatthoyaṃ vāsaddo.
anya-e0805n:3023_1: “Kvaci dhātvā”dinā bakārassa vakāro, pivati, pivanti. Pāti, pānti, panti vā. Pīyate, pīyante. Pīyati, pīyanti. Pivatu. Piveyya. Apāyi, pivi.
anya-e0805n:3024_0: Asa bhuvi, vibhattuppatti, appaccayalopo, asa itīdha –
anya-e0805n:3027_0: Asaiccetasmā dhātumhā parassa tissa vibhattissa tthittaṃ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca. Atthi.
anya-e0805n:3030_0: Sabbattha vibhattippaccayesu ca asaiccetāya dhātuyā ādissa lopo hoti vā,
anya-e0805n:3033_0: Asadhātussa antalopo hoti simhi vibhattimhi ca. Tvaṃ asi.
anya-e0805n:3035_0: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā parassa thassa vibhattissa tthattaṃ hoti, dhātvantassa lopo ca. Tumhe attha.
anya-e0805n:3038_0: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā parāsaṃ mi maiccetāsaṃ vibhattīnaṃ mhimhaiccete ādesā honti vā,
anya-e0805n:3038_1: dhātvantassa lopo ca. Amhi, amha. Asmi, asma.
anya-e0805n:3040_0: Asaiccetāya dhātuyā parassa tussa vibhattissa tthuttaṃ hoti,
anya-e0805n:3040_2: Asassādilopo ca, santu. Āhi, attha. Asmi, asma.
anya-e0805n:3041_1: “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā asato eyyaeyyuṃ vibhattīnaṃ iyāiyuñca honti. Siyā, siyuṃ.
anya-e0805n:3042_0: Lopābhāve “kvaci dhātvā”dinā asato eyyādīnaṃ sadhātvantānaṃ ssa ssu ssa ssatha ssaṃ ssāmaādesā honti.
anya-e0805n:3043_0: Evamassa vacanīyo, assu. Assa, assatha. Assaṃ, assāma.
anya-e0805n:3044_0: Ajjataniyaṃ akārāgamo, dīgho ca, āsi, āsiṃsu, āsuṃ. Āsi, āsittha. Āsiṃ, āsimha.
anya-e0805n:3047_0: Asasseva dhātussa bhūādeso hoti vā asabbadhātuke. Bhavissati, bhavissanti. Abhavissa, abhavissaṃsu.
anya-e0805n:3049_0: Brū viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, tyādyuppatti, appaccayalopo ca.
anya-e0805n:3052_0: Brūiccetāya dhātuyā paro īkārāgamo hoti timhi vibhattimhi kvaci,
anya-e0805n:3052_3: “aññesu cā”ti suttānuvattitavāggahaṇena brūdhātussa byañjane vuddhi na hoti,
anya-e0805n:3052_4: bahuvacane “jhalānamiyuvā sare vā”ti ūkārassa sare uvādeso, bruvanti.
anya-e0805n:3052_5: “Kvaci dhātvā”dinā brūto tiantīnaṃ vā a u ādesā brūssa āhādeso ca.
anya-e0805n:3053_0: Āha, āhu. Brūsi, brūtha. Brūmi, brūma. Brūte, bruvante. Brūse, bruvavhe. Bruve, brūmhe. Brūtu, bruvantu. Brūhi, brūtha. Brūmi, brūma. Brūtaṃ,
anya-e0805n:3055_0: Ajjataniyaṃ abravi, abruvi, abravuṃ. Bravissati. Abravissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n:3056_1: timhi kvaci appaccayalopo, hanti, hanati, hananti. Hanasi, hanatha. Hanāmi, hanāma.
anya-e0805n:3057_1: dvittañca, haññate, haññante, haññare. Haññati, haññanti. Hanatu, hanantu. Haneyya.
anya-e0805n:3060_0: Hanaiccetassa dhātussa vadhādeso hoti vā sabbattha vibhattippaccayesu,
anya-e0805n:3065_0: Hakārassa abbhāse vattamānassa jo hoti. “Lopañcetta makāro”ti appaccayalopo, vuddhi. Juhoti.
anya-e0805n:3068_0: Jhalasaññānaṃ ivaṇṇuvaṇṇānaṃ yakāravakārādesā honti sare pareti apadantassa ukārassa vakāro.
anya-e0805n:3069_0: Juhvati, juhoti, juhvanti, juhonti. Juhvasi, juhosi, juhvatha, juhotha. Juhvāmi, juhomi, juhvāma, juhoma.
anya-e0805n:3070_0: Kamme “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā dīgho, hūyate, hūyante. Hūyati, hūyanti.
anya-e0805n:3071_1: juhvantu vā. Juhe, juheyya, juheyyuṃ. Ajuhavi, ajuhavuṃ. Ajuhosi, ajuhosuṃ.
anya-e0805n:3072_0: Hā cāge, pure viya dvebhāvajādesa appaccayalopā.
anya-e0805n:3076_0: Jahāti, jahanti. Jahāsi, jahātha. Jahāmi, jahāma.
anya-e0805n:3077_0: Kamme “yamhi dādhāmāṭhāhāpāmahamathādīnamī”ti dhātvantassa īkāro. Hīyate, hīyante, hīyare. Hīyati, hīyanti.
anya-e0805n:3078_0: Tathā jahātu, jahantu. Jahe, jaheyya, jaheyyuṃ. Hīyetha, hīyeyya. Ajahāsi, ajahiṃsu, ajahāsuṃ. Pajahi,
anya-e0805n:3079_3: appaccayassa lopo, dadāti, dadanti. Dadāsi, dadātha. Dadāmi, dadāma.
anya-e0805n:3082_0: Dāiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa dajjādeso hoti vā,
anya-e0805n:3082_2: appaccayalopo. Dajjati, dajjanti. Dajjasi, dajjatha. Dajjāmi, dajjāma.
anya-e0805n:3085_0: Dāiccetassa dhātussa antassa aṃ hoti vā mimaiccetesu paresu,
anya-e0805n:3085_1: niggahītassa vaggantattaṃ. Dammi, damma. Demi, dema.
anya-e0805n:3086_0: Kamme “yamhi dādhā”iccādinā īkāro, dīyate, dīyante. Dīyati, dīyanti. Dīyyate, dīyyante. Dīyyati,
anya-e0805n:3087_0: Dadātu, dadantu. Dadāhi, dadātha. Dadāmi, dadāma. Dadataṃ, dadantaṃ. Dadassu, dadavho. Dade, dadāmase. Dajjatu,
anya-e0805n:3087_1: dajjantu iccādi. Detu, dentu. Dehi, detha. Demi, dema.
anya-e0805n:3089_7: Dvittābhāve deyya, deyyuṃ. Deyyāsi, deyyātha. Dīyetha, dīyeyya.
anya-e0805n:3091_1: adajjiṃsu. Adāsi, adaṃsu. Adāsi, ado, adittha. Adāsiṃ, adāsimha, adamha.
anya-e0805n:3092_6: Rassattaṃ, dassati, dassanti. Dassasi, dassatha. Dassāmi, dassāma. Dassate.
anya-e0805n:3096_0: Tathā dadhātu, pidahatu, nidhetu, nidhentu. Dadhe, dadheyya, pidahe,
anya-e0805n:3096_1: pidaheyya, nidhe, nidheyya. Dadhāsi, pidahi. Dhassati,
anya-e0805n:3098_0: Avuddhikā tudādī ca, hūvādi ca tathāparo;
anya-e0805n:3102_0: Rudha āvaraṇe, pure viya dhātusaññādimhi kate vibhattuppatti.
anya-e0805n:3105_1: Rudhaiccevamādito dhātugaṇato appaccayo hoti kattari vibhattippaccayesu,
anya-e0805n:3105_2: niggahītañca tato pubbaṃ hutvā āgamo hoti,
anya-e0805n:3105_3: tañca niggahītaṃ pakatiyā sarānugatattā dhātussarato paraṃ hoti.
anya-e0805n:3107_0: Kamme nipubbo yappaccayassa “tassa cavagga”iccādinā sadhātvantassa jhakāre kate “vagge ghosā”tiādinā dvittaṃ,
anya-e0805n:3111_0: Yuja yoge, yuñjati, yuñjanti. Yujjate, yujjante. Yujjati, yujjanti. Yuñjatu. Yujjataṃ. Yuñje. Yujjetha. Ayuñji,
anya-e0805n:3113_0: Bhavissantiyaṃ “karassa sappaccayassa kāho”ti sutte sappaccayaggahaṇena bhujato ssassa khādeso,
anya-e0805n:3114_0: Muca mocane, muñcati, muñcanti. Muccate, muccante. Muñcatu, muñcantu. Muccataṃ,
anya-e0805n:3119_0: Divādito dhātugaṇato yappaccayo hoti kattari vihitesu vibhattippaccayesu.
anya-e0805n:3120_0: “Yaggahaṇaṃ, cavagga yakāra vakārattaṃ sadhātvantassa, pubbarūpa”nti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n:3122_1: tathā kattaripi yappaccayassa sadhātvantassa cavagga yakāravakārādeso,
anya-e0805n:3122_2: pubbarūpañca kātabbānīti dhātvantassa vakārattā saha tena yakārassa vakāre kate dvibhāvo,
anya-e0805n:3122_3: “do dhassa cā”ti ettha caggahaṇena “bo vassā”ti vuttattā vakāradvayassa bakāradvayaṃ, dibbati, dibbanti. Dibbasi, dibbatha. Dibbāmi, dibbāma.
anya-e0805n:3123_0: Kamme dibbate, dibbante. Dibbati, dibbanti. Dibbatu. Dibbataṃ. Dibbe. Dibbetha. Adibbi.
anya-e0805n:3124_0: Sivu tantasantāne, sibbati, sibbanti. Sibbatu. Sibbeyya. Asibbi, sibbi.
anya-e0805n:3125_0: Pada gatimhi, upubbo dvittaṃ, “tathā kattari cā”ti sadhātvantassa yakārassa jakāro, dvittañca.
anya-e0805n:3127_0: Kamme paṭipajjate, paṭipajjante. Paṭipajjati, paṭipajjanti. Bhāve uppajjate tayā.
anya-e0805n:3134_0: Naha bandhane, “ha vipariyayo”ti yogavibhāgena vipariyayo. Sannayhati, sannayhanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n:3135_0: Mana ñāṇe, ñādesova viseso, maññati, maññanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n:3137_0: Tusa pītimhi, yappaccayassa pubbarūpattaṃ, tussati, tussanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n:3140_1: “janādīnamā timhi cā”ti ettha “janādīnamā”ti yogavibhāgena yamhi dhātvantassa ākāro. Jāyati, jāyanti. Jāyate, jāyante.
anya-e0805n:3146_0: Suiccevamādito dhātugaṇato ṇu ṇāuṇāiccete paccayā honti kattari vihitesu vibhattippaccayesu.
anya-e0805n:3147_1: saralopādi, suṇanti. Suṇosi, suṇotha. Suṇomi, suṇoma.
anya-e0805n:3147_3: “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā rassattaṃ, suṇasi, suṇātha, suṇatha. Suṇāmi, suṇāma.
anya-e0805n:3148_0: Kamme yappaccaye “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā dīgho, sūyate, sūyante. Sūyati, sūyanti.
anya-e0805n:3149_0: Suṇotu, suṇantu. Suṇohi, suṇotha. Suṇomi, suṇoma. Suṇātu, suṇantu. Suṇa, suṇāhi, suṇātha. Suṇāmi, suṇāma. Suṇataṃ, suṇantaṃ. Suṇassu, suṇavho. Suṇe, suṇāmase.
anya-e0805n:3152_12: Ṇāpaccayalopo, vuddhi, sossati, sossanti. Sossasi, sossatha. Sossāmi, sossāma. Sossate.
anya-e0805n:3155_0: Mi pakkhepe, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā ṇassa nattaṃ, minoti, minanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n:3158_8: “Kvaci dhātū”tiādinā sakantassa khādeso ajjatanādimhi, asakkhi, sakkhi,
anya-e0805n:3161_0: Kī dabbavinimaye, vipubbo dvittaṃ, pure viya vibhattuppatti.
anya-e0805n:3163_0: Kīicceva mādito dhātugaṇato nāpaccayo hoti kattari.
anya-e0805n:3165_2: Evaṃ jinātu. Jīyatu. Jineyya. Jīyeyya. Ajini, jini, ajiniṃsu, jiniṃsu. Ajesi, ajesuṃ.
anya-e0805n:3166_0: Tathā ci caye, cināti, cinanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n:3170_0: Ñāiccetassa dhātussa jā jaṃ nāiccete ādesā honti vā.
anya-e0805n:3171_0: Jādeso nāmhi jaṃ ñāmhi, nābhāvo timhi evidha;
anya-e0805n:3176_0: Eyyassa vibhattissa ñāiccetāya dhātuyā parassa iyā ñāiccete ādesā honti vā, saralopādi. Vijāniyā.
anya-e0805n:3180_0: Ñāiccetāya dhātuyā parassa nāpaccayassa lopo hoti vā,
anya-e0805n:3187_0: Mā māne, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā māntassa ikāro, mināti, minanti. Kamme mīyati, mīyanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n:3188_0: Lū chedane, nāmhi rassattaṃ, lunāti, lunanti. Lūyati, lūyanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n:3189_0: Dhū kampane, dhunāti, dhunanti. Dhūyati, dhūyanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n:3192_0: Gahaiccevamādito dhātuto ppa ṇhāiccete paccayā honti kattari. Ādisaddoyaṃ pakāro.
anya-e0805n:3195_0: Gahaiccetassa dhātussa hakārassa lopo hoti ṇhāmhi paccaye pare.
anya-e0805n:3195_2: rassatte gaṇhati vā, gaṇhanti. Gaṇhāsi, gaṇhātha. Gaṇhāmi, gaṇhāma.
anya-e0805n:3196_0: Kamme “ye”ti vattamāne “havipariyayo lo vā”ti hakārassa yakārena vipariyayo hoti. Gayhati, gayhanti.
anya-e0805n:3197_0: Gaṇhātu, gaṇhantu. Gaṇha, gaṇhāhi, gaṇhātha. Gaṇhāmi, gaṇhāma. Gaṇhataṃ,
anya-e0805n:3198_0: Yadā “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā asabbadhātuke vikaraṇapaccayassa lopo, ikārāgamassa ekāro ca, tadā sāgamo.
anya-e0805n:3202_0: Gahaiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa gheādeso hoti ppappaccaye pare. Gheppati iccādi.
anya-e0805n:3207_0: Tanuiccevamādito dhātugaṇato oyiraiccete paccayā honti kattari. Karatovāyaṃ yirappaccayo.
anya-e0805n:3208_0: Dhammaṃ tanoti, tanonti. Tanosi, tanotha. Tanomi, tanoma.
anya-e0805n:3211_2: Ettha ca vikaraṇakāriyavidhippakaraṇato “okāro”ti ovikaraṇaṃ gayhati. Tanute,
anya-e0805n:3211_3: bahuvacane “yavakārā cā”ti vattaṃ, tanvante. Tanuse, tanuvhe. Tanve, tanumhe.
anya-e0805n:3212_0: Kamme “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā tanudhātvantassa yamhi ākāro, patāyate,
anya-e0805n:3212_4: pataññanti. Tanotu, tanontu. Taneyya, taneyyuṃ. Atani, ataniṃsu.
anya-e0805n:3217_4: vakārassa dvitte tassa “bbo vvassā”ti bakāradvayaṃ, kubbanti, karonti. Karosi, karotha. Karomi, karoma.
anya-e0805n:3217_5: Tathā kurute, kubbante. Kuruse, kuruvhe. Kubbe, kurumhe.
anya-e0805n:3219_1: kurutu vā, kubbantu, karontu. Karohi, karotha. Karomi, karoma. Kurutaṃ,
anya-e0805n:3220_0: Kamme karīyatu, karīyantu, kayyataṃ, kayirataṃ, kayiratu.
anya-e0805n:3226_0: Hiyyattaniyaṃ “karassa kā”ti yogavibhāgena kā hoti, saralopādi.
anya-e0805n:3227_1: akarottha. Akaṃ, akaraṃ, akamha, akaramha. Akattha. Akariṃ,
anya-e0805n:3230_0: Kara iccetassa dhātussa sabbasseva kāsattaṃ hoti vā ajjatanimhi vibhattimhi pare.
anya-e0805n:3230_2: Atha vā yadā karassa kā hoti,
anya-e0805n:3230_4: tadā “sattamajjatanimhī”ti yogavibhāgena aññasmāpi dhātuto sāgamopi sijjhati,
anya-e0805n:3230_6: “karassa kā”ti yogavibhāgena kābhāvo ca hiyyattaniyaṃ siddho hoti.
anya-e0805n:3231_3: Kāsattābhāve akari, kari, akariṃsu, kariṃsu, akaṃsu, akaruṃ. Akari,
anya-e0805n:3232_0: “Vā, lopo, bhavissantimhi ssassa cā”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n:3234_0: Karaiccetassa dhātussa sappaccayassa kāhādeso hoti vā bhavissantimhi,
anya-e0805n:3234_3: vasa chidi labhādito chādeso ca hoti.
anya-e0805n:3235_0: Kāhati, kāhanti. Kāhasi, kāhatha. Kāhāmi, kāhāma.
anya-e0805n:3236_1: tadā “purasamupaparīhi karotissa kha kharā vā”ti yogavibhāgena tyādivibhattīsupi saṃpubbakarotissa kharādeso.
anya-e0805n:3238_0: Saka sattimhi, opaccayo, sakkoti, sakkonti. Sakkosi, sakkotha. Sakkomi, sakkoma iccādi.
anya-e0805n:3239_0: Apa pāpuṇane, papubbo, pappoti, papponti. Papposi, pappotha. Pappomi, pappoma. Pappotu,
anya-e0805n:3242_0: Dhura theyye, pure viya dhātvantalopo, vibhattuppatti.
anya-e0805n:3243_0: “Tathā kattari cā”ti ito “kattarī”ti ca sīhavilokanena bhāvakammaggahaṇāni ca vattante,
anya-e0805n:3245_0: Curaiccevamādito dhātugaṇato ṇe ṇayaiccete paccayā honti kattari,
anya-e0805n:3249_0: Asaṃyogantassa dhātussa kārite pare vuddhi hotīti ukārassokāro vuddhi.
anya-e0805n:3250_0: Dhanaṃ coreti, corenti. Coresi, coretha. Coremi, corema.
anya-e0805n:3251_0: Kamme yappaccaye īkārāgamo, saralopādi ca, corīyate devadattena, corīyati, corīyanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n:3252_0: Coretu, corentu. Corehi. Corayatu, corayantu. Coraya, corayāhi.
anya-e0805n:3253_1: corayeyyuṃ. Acoresi, coresi, acoresuṃ, coresuṃ. Acorayi, corayi,
anya-e0805n:3255_0: Tathā cinta cintāyaṃ, saṃyogantattā vuddhiabhāvova viseso.
anya-e0805n:3257_0: Manta guttabhāsane, manteti, mantayati iccādi purimasamaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3258_0: Pāla rakkhaṇe, dhammaṃ pāleti, pālayati. Pālīyati. Pāletu, pālayatu iccādi.
anya-e0805n:3259_0: Ghaṭa ghaṭane, ghāṭeti, ghāṭayati, ghaṭeti, ghaṭayati, ghaṭādittā vikappena vuddhi.
anya-e0805n:3261_0: Gaṇa saṅkhyāne, “ghaṭādīnaṃ vā”ti na vuddhi, gaṇeti, gaṇayati iccādi, sabbattha subodhaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3263_0: Bhūvādī ca rudhādī ca, divādī svādayo gaṇā;
anya-e0805n:3264_0: Kiyādī ca tanādī ca, curādī cidha sattadhā.
anya-e0805n:3268_0: Tattha dhātvatthe niddiṭṭhā khādikāritantā paccayā dhātuppaccayā nāma.
anya-e0805n:3270_0: “Dhātuliṅgehi parā paccayā”ti ito dhātuggahaṇaṃ anuvattate, “parā, paccayā”ti ca adhikāro.
anya-e0805n:3271_0: 528. Tija gupa kita mānehi kha cha sā vā.
anya-e0805n:3272_0: Tija gupa kita māna iccetehi dhātūhi kha cha sa iccete paccayā parā honti vā.
anya-e0805n:3273_0: Tijato khantiyaṃ khova, nindāyaṃ gupato tu cho;
anya-e0805n:3278_0: Dhātvantassa byañjanassa kakārādeso hoti khappaccaye pare.
anya-e0805n:3282_0: Dhātvatthe niddiṭṭhehi khādikāritantehi paccayehi tyādayo vibhattiyo hontīti pure viya vattamānādayo yojetabbā.
anya-e0805n:3284_0: Khappaccayābhāve appaccayassa ekāro, tejeti, tejati vā, tejanti iccādi.
anya-e0805n:3287_0: Dhātvanthassa byañjanassa cakārādeso hoti chappaccayesu paresu.
anya-e0805n:3291_0: Abbhāsagatānaṃ māna kitaiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ vakāratakārattaṃ hoti vā yathākkamanti takāro,
anya-e0805n:3294_0: Tato abbhāsato parāsaṃ pāmānānaṃ dhātūnaṃ vāmaṃiccete ādesā honti yathākkamaṃ sappaccaye pare.
anya-e0805n:3298_0: 534. Bhuja ghasa hara su pādīhi tumicchatthesu.
anya-e0805n:3299_0: Bhuja ghasa hara su pā iccevamādīhi dhātūhi tumicchatthesu ca kha cha saiccete paccayā honti vā.
anya-e0805n:3299_5: dhātvādissa dvebhāve kate “dutiyacatutthānaṃ paṭhamatatiyā”ti abbhāsabhakārassa bakāro,
anya-e0805n:3300_0: Vāti kimatthaṃ? Bhottumicchati, icchatthesūti kimatthaṃ? Bhottuṃ gacchati.
anya-e0805n:3304_0: Haraiccetassa dhātussa sabbassa gī hoti se paccaye pare.
anya-e0805n:3305_0: Su savaṇe, sotumicchati sussūsati, sussūsanti, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā dīgho.
anya-e0805n:3308_0: Saṅgho pabbatamiva attānamācarati, pabbato iva ācaratīti vā atthe –
anya-e0805n:3310_0: Ācaraṇakriyāya kattuno upamānabhūtamhā nāmato āyappaccayo hoti ācāratthe.
anya-e0805n:3310_4: dhātuppaccayantattā “tesaṃ vibhattiyo lopā cā”ti sutte tesaṃgahaṇena vibhattilopo,
anya-e0805n:3314_0: Upamānāti kiṃ? Dhammamācarati, ācāreti kiṃ? Achattaṃ chattamiva rakkhati.
anya-e0805n:3322_2: tena atikkamati”iccādike payujjitabbe vā sati nāmamhā ṇayappaccayo hoti,
anya-e0805n:3323_0: 540. Dhātūhi ṇe ṇaya ṇāpe ṇāpayā kāritāni hetvatthe.
anya-e0805n:3324_0: Sabbehi dhātūhi hetvatthe abhidheyye ṇe ṇayaṇāpe ṇāpaya iccete paccayā parā honti,
anya-e0805n:3324_3: so ca “yo kāreti sa hetū”ti laddhahetusañño suddhakattuno payojako hetukattā,
anya-e0805n:3324_4: atthato pesanajjhesanādiko payojakabyāpāro idha hetu nāma.
anya-e0805n:3326_0: Ṇe ṇayāva uvaṇṇantā, āto dve pacchimā siyuṃ;
anya-e0805n:3328_0: Akammā dhātavo honti, kārite tu sakammakā;
anya-e0805n:3331_0: Na bhāve suddhakattā ca, kārite kammasaññito.
anya-e0805n:3334_2: atha vā bhavantaṃ bhavituṃ samatthaṃ payojayati,
anya-e0805n:3334_3: bhavituṃ payojetīti vā atthe iminā ṇeṇayappaccayā,
anya-e0805n:3337_0: Te dhātvantabhūtā okārekārā āvaāyādese pāpuṇanti kārite pare.
anya-e0805n:3337_1: “Te āvāyā”ti yogavibhāgena jheādīnaṃ akāritepi hontīti okārassa āvādeso,
anya-e0805n:3349_0: Abhāvissa, abhāvayissa, abhāvissaṃsu, abhāvayissaṃsu. Kamme abhāvīyissatha, abhāvīyissa iccādi.
anya-e0805n:3350_3: pacituṃ vā payojetīti atthe vuttanayena ṇe ṇayādayo,
anya-e0805n:3351_0: So devadattaṃ odanaṃ pāceti, pācenti. Pācesi, pācetha. Pācemi, pācema. Pācayati,
anya-e0805n:3351_3: Ṇāpeṇāpayesu pana so puriso taṃ purisaṃ odanaṃ pācāpeti,
anya-e0805n:3352_0: Kamme so odanaṃ pācīyati tena, pācayīyati, pācāpīyati, pācāpayīyati.
anya-e0805n:3354_0: Gacchantaṃ, gantuṃ vā payojetīti atthe ṇe ṇayādayo, vuddhiyaṃ sampattāyaṃ –
anya-e0805n:3357_0: Ghaṭādīnaṃ dhātūnaṃ asaṃyogantānaṃ vuddhi hoti vā kāriteti ettha vāggahaṇena vuddhi na hoti,
anya-e0805n:3358_0: So taṃ purisaṃ gāmaṃ gameti, gamayati,
anya-e0805n:3362_0: Guhadusaiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ saro dīghamāpajjate kārite pare, vuddhāpavādoyaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3365_0: Tathā tudantaṃ payojayati todeti, todayati, todāpeti,
anya-e0805n:3369_0: Hanaiccetassa dhātussa ghātādeso hoti ṇakāravati kāritappaccaye pare. Ghāteti,
anya-e0805n:3373_0: Suṇantaṃ payojayati dhammaṃ sāveti, sāvayati. Pāpuṇantaṃ payojayati pāpeti, pāpayati.
anya-e0805n:3386_0: Taṃ yathā bhikkhu bhāveti, maggaṃ rāgādidūsakanti.
anya-e0805n:3394_0: Bhū sattāyaṃ, “bhūyate, abhavittha, bhavissate vā devadattenā”ti viggahe –
anya-e0805n:3395_0: “Dhātuyā kammādimhi ṇo”ti ito “dhātuyā”ti sabbattha paccayādividhāne vattate, “parā,
anya-e0805n:3397_0: Bhāvakammaiccetesvatthesu sabbadhātūhi tabba anīyaiccete paccayā parā honti.
anya-e0805n:3399_0: Akammakehi dhātūhi, bhāve kiccā bhavanti te;
anya-e0805n:3403_1: ye idha tatiye dhātvādhikāre vihitā aniddiṭṭhakālā ṇādayo paccayā,
anya-e0805n:3403_2: te tekālikā hontīti paribhāsato kālattayepi honti.
anya-e0805n:3406_0: Yathāgamaṃ yathāpayogaṃ jinavacanānuparodhena dhātūhi paro ikārāgamo hoti kvaci byañjanādikesu kiccakitakappaccayesu,
anya-e0805n:3408_0: Ye idha vuttā tabbānīyaṇya teyya riccappaccayā,
anya-e0805n:3408_2: Tato “aññe kiti”ti vacanato kiccappaccayānamakitakattā nāmabyapadese asampatte “taddhitasamāsakitakā
anya-e0805n:3413_0: Vattabbassa abhāvā na, dutiyā paṭhamā tato.
anya-e0805n:3416_5: ettha ca “kattarī”ti adhikāraṃ vinā “divādito yo”ti vinādhikārayogavibhāgena yappaccayo,
anya-e0805n:3417_0: Budha avagamane, abujjhittha, bujjhate, bujjhissateti bujjhitabbo dhammo, bujjhanīyo.
anya-e0805n:3418_5: “svādito ṇu ṇā uṇā cā”ti vinādhikārayogavibhāgena ṇāpaccayo, savaṇīyo.
anya-e0805n:3419_0: Kara karaṇe, karīyittha, karīyati, karīyissatīti atthe tabbā’nīyā.
anya-e0805n:3422_0: Karaiccetassa dhātussa antabhūtassa rakārassa takārattaṃ hoti vā tuṃ tu na tabbaiccetesu paccayesu paresu.
anya-e0805n:3422_4: tattābhāve “karotissā”ti vattamāne “tavetunādīsu kā”ti ettha ādisaddena tabbepi kādeso,
anya-e0805n:3424_0: Rakāra hahārādyantehi dhātūhi parassa anānīyādinakārassa ṇakāro hoti. Ādisaddena ramu apañātāditopi.
anya-e0805n:3427_0: Karaṇīyo dhammo, karaṇārahoti attho, karaṇīyā, karaṇīyaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3430_0: Ādiggahaṇena ramu kīḷāyaṃ, ramīyittha, ramīyati, ramīyissatīti ramitabbo, ramaṇīyo vihāro.
anya-e0805n:3434_0: Gama khana hanaiccevamādīnaṃ makāra nakārantānaṃ dhātūnamantassa nakāro hoti vā tuṃ tabba tave tuna tvānatvāiccevamādīsu takārādippaccayesu paresu.
anya-e0805n:3436_0: Hana hiṃsā gatīsu, ahaññittha, haññate, haññissateti hantabbaṃ, hanitabbaṃ, hananīyaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3442_0: Bhāvakammesu sabbadhātūhi ṇyappaccayo hoti, caggahaṇena “ñāteyya”ntiādīsu teyyappaccayo ca.
anya-e0805n:3444_1: ṇakārānubandho paccayo kāritaṃ viya daṭṭhabboti kāritabyapadeso,
anya-e0805n:3445_0: Hara haraṇe, aharīyittha, harīyati, harīyissatīti vā haritabbaṃ hāriyaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3447_2: “yavataṃ talana”iccādisutte kāraggahaṇena yavato bhakārassa bhakāro, dvittaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3448_0: Sāsa anusiṭṭhimhi, sāsitabbo sisso, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā ākārassikāro.
anya-e0805n:3449_0: Vaca viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, ṇyappaccayādimhi kate “antānaṃ, ṇānubandhe”ti ca vattate.
anya-e0805n:3451_0: Cajaiccetesaṃ dhātvantānaṃ kakāra gakārādesā honti ṇakārānubandhe paccaye pareti cassa kādeso.
anya-e0805n:3452_0: Bhaja sevāyaṃ, bhajanīyaṃ bhāgyaṃ, jassa gādeso.
anya-e0805n:3453_5: vinipubbo “do dhassa cā”ti sutte caggahaṇena cakārassa chakāro,
anya-e0805n:3453_9: “Kiyādito nā”ti vinādhikārayogavibhāgena tabbānīya tuṃ tunā dīsu ca nāpaccayo,
anya-e0805n:3454_0: Nī pāpuṇane, anīyittha, nīyati, nīyissatīti neyyo, neyyā, neyyaṃ. Netabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3457_0: Bhū iccetasmā parassa ṇyappaccayassa saha dhātvantena abbādeso hoti.
anya-e0805n:3459_0: 556. Vada mada gamu yuja garahākārādīhi jjammaggayheyyāgāro vā.
anya-e0805n:3460_0: Vada mada gamu yuja garahaiccevamādīhi dhātūhi,
anya-e0805n:3460_1: ākārantehi ca parassa ṇyappaccayassa dhātvantena saha yathākkamaṃ jja mma gga yha e yyaiccete ādesā honti vā,
anya-e0805n:3463_0: Yuja yoge, ayujjittha, yujjate, yujjissatīti yoggaṃ, niyojjo vā.
anya-e0805n:3464_5: garassa gārādeso ca, gārayho, gārayhā, gārayhaṃ,
anya-e0805n:3466_3: tassiminā dhātvantena ākārena saha eyyādeso, deyyaṃ, dātabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3466_4: Anīye “saralopo”tiādinā pubbasarassa lope sampatte tattheva tuggahaṇena nisedhetvā “sarā sare lopa”nti ākāre lutte parasarassa dīgho, dānīyaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3467_2: pīyissatīti peyyaṃ, pātabbaṃ, pānīyaṃ. Hā cāge,
anya-e0805n:3467_4: hīyissatīti heyyaṃ, hātabbaṃ, hānīyaṃ. Mā māne,
anya-e0805n:3467_12: “Ñāssa jā jaṃ nā”ti jādese “kiyādito nā”ti vinādhikārayogavibhāgena nāpaccayo,
anya-e0805n:3471_0: Rakārānubandhe paccaye pare sabbo dhātvanto rādi paccayarakāramariyādo no hoti,
anya-e0805n:3473_3: Atisaggonāma “kimidaṃ mayā kattabba”nti puṭṭhassa vā “pāṇo na hantabbo”tiādinā paṭipattidassanamukhena vā kattabbassa anuññā.
anya-e0805n:3473_4: Pattakālo nāma sampattasamayo yo attano kiccakaraṇasamayamanupaparikkhitvā na karoti,
anya-e0805n:3473_7: Te ca “bhāvakammesu kiccattakkhatthā”ti vuttattā bhāvakammesveva bhavanti.
anya-e0805n:3474_1: karīyatu bhavatā kammanti atthe iminā tabbānīyā,
anya-e0805n:3475_0: Atisagge bhujjatu bhavatāti atthe tabbādi, “aññesu cā”ti vuddhi.
anya-e0805n:3480_9: avassaṃ kattabbanti vākye pana “kiccā”ti adhikicca “avassakādhamiṇesu ṇī cā”ti avassakādhamiṇatthe ca tabbādayo,
anya-e0805n:3480_12: Evaṃ dātabbaṃ me bhavatā sataṃ, dānīyaṃ, deyyaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3481_0: Dhara dhāraṇe, curādittā ṇeṇayā, vuddhi, ikārāgamo ca, dhāretabbaṃ, dhārayitabbaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n:3482_0: “Nudādīhi yuṇvūnamanānanākānanakā sakāritehi cā”ti sakāritehipi yuṇvūnamādesavidhānatoyeva dhātuppaccayantatopi
anya-e0805n:3494_0: Kammasmiṃ ādimhi sati dhātuyā paro ṇappaccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n:3497_0: Tatiye dhātvādhikāre vihitā kiccehi aññe paccayā kiticceva saññā hontīti kitasaññā katā.
anya-e0805n:3499_0: Kattari kārake kitapaccayo hotīti niyamato kattari bhavati,
anya-e0805n:3499_1: so ca “ṇādayo tekālikā”ti vuttattā kālattaye ca hoti.
anya-e0805n:3499_3: paccayantassāliṅgattā syādimhi asampatte “taddhitasamāsakitakā nāmaṃvātavetunādīsu cā”ti kitakantattā nāmaṃva kate syādyuppatti,
anya-e0805n:3499_4: tato kumbhaṃ karotīti atthe “amādayo parapadebhī”ti dutiyātappurisasamāso,
anya-e0805n:3501_0: Gaha upādāne, pattaṃ agaṇhi, gaṇhāti, gaṇhissatīti vā pattaggāho. Evaṃ rasmiggāho, rajjuggāho.
anya-e0805n:3503_0: Mā parimāṇe, dhaññaṃ amini, mināti, minissatīti vā atthe ṇappaccaye kate –
anya-e0805n:3506_0: Ākārantānaṃ dhātūnaṃ antassa āyādeso hoti ṇakārānubandhe paccaye pare,
anya-e0805n:3510_0: Kammūpapade ādimhi sati saññāyaṃ gamyamānāyaṃ dhātuyā appaccayo hoti,
anya-e0805n:3510_2: Ettha ca “nu niggahītaṃ padante”ti sutte “padante”ti vacanato upapadanteyeva nukārāgamo hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3510_4: Ayaṃ pana nvāgamo samāsaṃ katvā upapadavibhattilope kateyeva hotīti veditabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3516_0: Purasadde ādimhi sati “dada dāne”iccetāya dhātuyā appaccayo hoti,
anya-e0805n:3516_2: Ettha ca “tadanuparodhenā”ti paribhāsato purasaddantasseva iṃ hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3516_3: Ṇādīnaṃ tekālikattepi upapadatthavisesena atīteyevāyamappaccayo hotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3519_0: Sabbato dhātuto kammādimhi vā akammādimhi vā sati a ṇvu tu āvī iccete cattāro paccayā honti.
anya-e0805n:3522_0: Akammādimhi pana “yasmā dapetī”ti sutte bhayaggahaṇena sesasādhanepi appaccayo.
anya-e0805n:3523_9: nissīyissatīti vā nissayo. Si saye, anusayi, anuseti,
anya-e0805n:3524_1: paṭicca ekasmā phalametīti paccayo, samudayo. Ci caye,
anya-e0805n:3528_0: Pādena pivatīti pādapo. Evaṃ kacchapo, tatiyātappuriso.
anya-e0805n:3531_0: Gahaiccetassa dhātussa upadhassa ettaṃ hoti vā,
anya-e0805n:3532_1: so ca “aññe kita”ti kitasaññattā “kattari kita”ti kattariyeva bhavati,
anya-e0805n:3534_0: Yuṇvuiccetesaṃ paccayānaṃ ana akaiccete ādesā hontīti akādeso.
anya-e0805n:3536_2: Ettha hi “kagā cajāna”nti cajānaṃ kagatte sampatte –
anya-e0805n:3538_0: Dhātvantabhūtā cakārajakārā kakāra gakārattaṃ nāpajjante ṇvuppaccaye pareti paṭisiddhattā na bhavati.
anya-e0805n:3539_2: “ghaṭādīnaṃ vā”ti ettha vāggahaṇena vuddhi na hoti.
anya-e0805n:3541_1: sakāritehi ca dhātūhi paresaṃ yuṇvuppaccayānaṃ yathākkamaṃ ana ānana aka ānanakaiccete ādesā honti.
anya-e0805n:3547_0: Sakāritehi pana āṇa pesane, āṇāpesi, āṇāpeti,
anya-e0805n:3547_1: āṇāpessatīti vā atthe “sabbato ṇvutvāvī vā”ti ṇvuppaccayo,
anya-e0805n:3548_1: karissatīti vā atthe “sabbato ṇvutvāvī vā”ti tuppaccayo,
anya-e0805n:3548_2: so ca kitasaññattā ṇvuppaccayo viya sabbattha kattariyeva bhavati.
anya-e0805n:3551_0: Karaiccetassa dhātussa antassa rakārassa takārattaṃ hoti tuppaccaye pare.
anya-e0805n:3552_21: “Gama khana hanādīnaṃ tuṃ tabbādīsu na”iti dhātvantassa nattaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3553_2: Evaṃ sāretā, sārayitā, dāpetā, dāpayitā, hāpetā, hāpayitā,
anya-e0805n:3553_5: bodhayitā, ñāpetā, ñāpayitā, sāvetā, sāvayitā, gāhebhā, gāhayitā, kāretā, kārayitā, kārāpetā,
anya-e0805n:3555_0: Sāsa anusiṭṭhimhi, sadevakaṃ lokaṃ diṭṭhadhammikādivasena sāsatīti atthe –
anya-e0805n:3562_0: Māna pūjāyaṃ, dhammena puttaṃ mānetīti atthe –
anya-e0805n:3564_0: Māna bhāsaiccevamādīhi dhātūhi rātuppaccayo hoti, rādilopo, mātā.
anya-e0805n:3565_0: Visa pavesane papubbo, pāvisi, pavisati, pavisissatīti vā atthe –
anya-e0805n:3567_0: Visa ruja padaiccevamādīhi dhātūhi paro ṇappaccayo hotīti ṇappaccayo.
anya-e0805n:3571_0: Saṃyogasmiṃ ādibhūto nakāro niggahītamāpajjate. Niggahītassa vaggantattaṃ, jakārassa gattaṃ, raṅgo.
anya-e0805n:3573_0: Ranjaiccetassa dhātussa antabhūtassa njassa jakārādeso hoti bhāvakaraṇaiccetesvatthesu vihite ṇakāravatippaccaye pare.
anya-e0805n:3580_0: Bhāvatthe bhāvābhidheyye dhātūhi ṇappaccayo hoti. Bhūyate,
anya-e0805n:3582_0: Daha bhasmīkaraṇe, pariḍayhittha, pariḍayhati, pariḍayhissati, pariḍayhanaṃ vāti atthe ṇappaccayo.
anya-e0805n:3585_0: Dahaiccetassa dhātussa dakāro lattamāpajjate ṇappaccaye pare vā. Pariḷāho, paridāho.
anya-e0805n:3588_0: 582. Purasamupaparīhi karotissa khakharā vā tappaccayesu ca.
anya-e0805n:3589_0: Pura saṃ upa pariiccetehi parassa karotissa dhātussa kha kharaiccete ādesā honti vā tappaccaye,
anya-e0805n:3589_3: Dhātvādesassāpi ṭhānopacārena dhātuvohārato “asaṃyogantassa vuddhi kārite”ti vuddhi, saṅkhāro.
anya-e0805n:3591_11: muyhanamattameva vā tanti moho iccādi kattukaraṇabhāvesu yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3592_0: Gaha upādāne, gayhatīti atthe visarujapadādinā kammani ṇappaccayo.
anya-e0805n:3594_0: Gahaiccetassa dhātussa gharādeso hoti vā ṇappaccaye pare, saralopādi, gharaṃ, gharāni.
anya-e0805n:3595_0: Vāti kiṃ? Gaṇhāti, gahaṇaṃ vā gāho.
anya-e0805n:3598_0: Sabbadhātūhi kvipaccayo hoti, so ca kitasaññattā kattari bhavati.
anya-e0805n:3600_1: Kitantattā nāmamiva katvā syādyuppatti, silopo, sambhū.
anya-e0805n:3604_0: Dhātvantassa byañjanassa lopo hoti kvippaccaye pare. Kvilopo, bhujago.
anya-e0805n:3605_15: Evaṃ thalajo, paṅkajaṃ, jalajaṃ, aṇḍajaṃ, sirajaṃ,
anya-e0805n:3606_0: Vida ñāṇe, lokaṃ avedīti atthe kvippaccayo.
anya-e0805n:3609_0: Vidadhātuno ante ūkārāgamo hoti kvimhi, kvilopo. Lokavidū.
anya-e0805n:3610_0: Disa pekkhaṇe, imamiva naṃ apassi, passati, passissatīti, ayamiva dissatīti vā atthe kvippaccayo.
anya-e0805n:3612_0: 588. Iyatamakiesānamantassaro dīghaṃ kvaci disassa guṇaṃ do raṃ sakkhī ca.
anya-e0805n:3613_0: Ima ya ta amha kiṃ eta samānaiccetesaṃ sabbanāmānaṃ upamānupapadabhāvena disassa dhātussa guṇabhūtānaṃ anto saro dīghamāpajjate,
anya-e0805n:3613_1: disaiccetassa dhātussa antassa sa kkha īiccete ādesā ca honti.
anya-e0805n:3613_2: Disassa dakāro rakāramāpajjateti kvimhi dhātvantassa sasaddādesaṃ katvā kvilopādimhi ca kate iiti nipātanena imasaddassikāre,
anya-e0805n:3614_4: yo viya dissatīti vā yādiso, yādisā, yādisī, yādisaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3614_6: so viya dissatīti vā tādiso, tādisā, tādisī, tādisaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3614_8: ahaṃ viya so dissatīti vā mādiso, mādisā, mādisī, mādisaṃ,
anya-e0805n:3614_11: ko viya dissatīti vā kīdiso, kīdisā, kīdisī, kīdisaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3614_19: tadantassa vā dīgho, sādisā, sādisī, sadisā, sadisī, sādisaṃ, sadisaṃ.

anya-e0805n:3615_3: īkārādese īdī, yādī, tādī, mādī, kīdī, edī, sādī.
anya-e0805n:3616_0: Casaddena tumhādiupapadepi tumhe viya dissatīti tumhādiso,
anya-e0805n:3623_0: Rādilopo, dhammo, evaṃ karīyatīti kammaṃ. Vara varaṇe, vammaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3624_2: piyaṃ pasaṃsituṃ sīlaṃ yassāti vā piyaṃ pasaṃsanasīlo,
anya-e0805n:3626_1: tassīla taddhamma tassādhukārīsvatthesu gamyamānesu sabbadhātūhi ṇī tu āvīiccete paccayā hontīti kattari ṇīpaccayo,
anya-e0805n:3627_3: pasaṃsissati vā sīlena vā dhammena vā sādhu vāti piyapasaṃsī,
