anya-e0805n:3629_1: pasayha pavattituṃ sīlaṃ yassāti atthe iminā tuppaccayo,
anya-e0805n:3630_0: Bhayaṃ passituṃ sīlaṃ yassāti vā bhayaṃ dassanasīlo,
anya-e0805n:3632_0: 591. Sadda ku dha ca la ma ṇḍa ttha rucādīhi yu.
anya-e0805n:3633_0: Sadda ku dha ca la maṇḍatthehi dhātūhi, rucādīhi ca yuppaccayo hoti tassīlādīsvatthesu.
anya-e0805n:3634_1: ghosituṃ sīlaṃ assāti vā ghosanasīloti vā aghosayi,
anya-e0805n:3635_0: Kudha kope, kujjhituṃ sīlamassāti vā kujjhanasīloti vā kodhano, kodhanā, kodhanaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3636_0: Rusa rose, rosituṃ sīlamassāti vā rosanasīloti vā rosano.
anya-e0805n:3637_1: calituṃ sīlaṃ yassāti vā calati sīlenāti vā calano.
anya-e0805n:3637_3: kampituṃ sīlaṃ yassāti vā akampi, kampati,
anya-e0805n:3637_8: phandituṃ sīlaṃ yassāti vā phandati sīlenāti vā phandano.
anya-e0805n:3638_1: maṇḍayituṃ sīlaṃ yassāti vā maṇḍayati sīlenāti vā maṇḍano.
anya-e0805n:3638_5: bhūyayissati sīlenāti vā bhūsano, bhūsanā, bhūsanaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3641_0: Pārādiupapadehi parasmā gamiiccetasmā dhātumhā paro rūpaccayo hoti tassīlādīsvatthesu kattariyeva.
anya-e0805n:3641_3: bhavapāraṃ gantuṃ sīlaṃ yassāti vā bhavapāraṃ gamanasīlo,
anya-e0805n:3644_4: bhikkhissati sīlenāti vā bhikkhanadhammoti vā bhikkhane sādhukārīti vā bhikkhu,
anya-e0805n:3646_0: Hanatyādīnaṃ dhātūnamante ṇukappaccayo hoti tassīlādīsvatthesu kattari,
anya-e0805n:3648_1: aññāya ca dhātuyā paro rappaccayo hoti,
anya-e0805n:3650_0: Asaṃpubbā ca ro tena, paṭighotipi sijjhati.
anya-e0805n:3651_2: sammadeva kilesadarathe hanatīti vā saṅgho, rādilopo,
anya-e0805n:3654_0: Nandaiccevamādīhi dhātūhi paro yuppaccayo hoti bhāvakammesu.
anya-e0805n:3658_14: lūyati anenāti vā lavanaṃ, lavaṇaṃ, loṇaṃ vā. Nayati,
anya-e0805n:3662_0: Saññāyaṃ gamyamānāyaṃ dādhāiccetehi dhātūhi ippaccayo hoti,
anya-e0805n:3664_0: Itthiyaṃ abhidheyyāyaṃ sabbadhātūhi akāratiyuiccete paccayā honti vā bhāvakammādīsu.
anya-e0805n:3669_0: Gama khana hana ramaiccevamādīnaṃ makāranakārantānaṃ dhātūnaṃ anto byañjano no hoti tappaccaye,
anya-e0805n:3669_18: “Kvaci dhātū”tiādinā hādito tissa ni hoti. Hāni,
anya-e0805n:3673_0: Karadhātuto itthiyamanitthiyaṃ vā abhidheyyāyaṃ ririyappaccayo hoti, rādilopo.
anya-e0805n:3676_0: Jiiccetāya dhātuyā paro inappaccayo hoti sabbakāle kattari. Ji jaye,
anya-e0805n:3679_0: Supaiccetāya dhātuyā ca paro inappaccayo hoti. Supa saye, supati, supananti vā supino, supinaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3680_0: Sī saye, “īsaṃ”iti upapadaṃ, īsaṃ sīyati bhavatāti atthe –
anya-e0805n:3682_0: Īsaṃdusuiccetehi upapadehi parehi dhātūhi khappaccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n:3685_0: Bhāvakammaiccetesvatthesu kiccaktakkhatthaiccete paccayā hontīti niyamato bhāvakammesveva hoti.
anya-e0805n:3686_2: Evaṃ dukkhena karīyatīti dukkaraṃ hitaṃ bhavatā,
anya-e0805n:3690_0: Budhagamuiccegamādīhi dhātūhi tadatthe gamyamāne kattari tappaccayo hoti sabbakāle.
anya-e0805n:3693_0: Dhaḍhanta bhahantehi dhātūhi parassa paccayatakārassa yathākkamaṃ dhakāraḍhakārādesā hontīti dhabhato takārassa dhakāro,
anya-e0805n:3695_0: Hakāravaggacatutthānaṃ dhātvantabhūtānaṃ dakārādeso hoti dhakāre pare.
anya-e0805n:3698_0: Saññāyamabhidheyyāyaṃ āsiṭṭhe gamyamāne dhātūhi tippaccayo hoti,
anya-e0805n:3699_2: “bhidādito inna anna īṇā vā”ti tappaccayassa innādeso.
anya-e0805n:3701_0: Āpubbā gamito tukappaccayo hoti, kitakattā kattari. Āgacchatīti āgantuko.
anya-e0805n:3704_0: Gamito ikappaccayo hoti bhabbatthe. Gantuṃ bhabboti gamiko bhikkhu.
anya-e0805n:3708_0: Atīte kāle sabbehi dhātūhi ta tavantu tāvī iccete paccayā honti.
anya-e0805n:3708_4: “aññesu cā”ti etthānuvattitavāggahaṇena ta tavantutāvīsu vuddhi na hoti.
anya-e0805n:3710_0: Vasa nivāse, vassaṃ avasīti atthe tappaccayo, sakārantattā “sādisanta”iccādinā ṭhādese sampatte –
anya-e0805n:3713_0: Vasaiccetasmā dhātumhā parassa takārassa sahādibyañjanena utthādeso hoti,
anya-e0805n:3716_0: Vasaiccetassa dhātussa vakārassa takāre pare ukāro hoti,
anya-e0805n:3722_0: Hacatutthānaṃ dhātvantānaṃ ḍakārādeso hoti ḍhakāre pare. Vuḍḍho, vuḍḍhā,
anya-e0805n:3725_0: Taraiccevamādīhi dhātūhi parassa tappaccayassa iṇṇādeso hoti,
anya-e0805n:3725_9: “saralopo”tiādisutte tuggahaṇato pubbalopābhāve uvaṇṇato parassa “vā paro asarūpā”ti lopo,
anya-e0805n:3727_0: Susa paca sakaiccetehi dhātūhi parassa tappaccayassa kkhakkādesā honti,
anya-e0805n:3730_0: Pakkamaiccevamādīhi makārantehi dhātūhi parassa tappaccayassa ntādeso hoti,
anya-e0805n:3730_7: “do dhassa cā”ti sutte caggahaṇena kassa khattaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3731_0: Timhi – saṅkamanaṃ saṅkanti. Evaṃ okkanti, vibbhanti, khanti, santi danti iccādi.
anya-e0805n:3733_0: Janaiccevamādīnaṃ dhātūnamantassa byañjanassa āttaṃ hoti tappaccaye, timhi ca.
anya-e0805n:3733_6: Tappaccaye satipi takāre puna tiggahaṇakaraṇaṃ paccayantaratakāre āttanivattanatthaṃ, yathā – jantu. “Janitvā,
anya-e0805n:3733_7: janitu”ntiādīsu pana ikārena byavahitattā na bhavati.
anya-e0805n:3736_0: Ṭhā pāiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ antassa ākārassa yathākkamaṃ ikāraīkārādesā honti tappaccaye, timhi ca.
anya-e0805n:3737_0: 621. Hantehi ho hassa lo vā adahanahānaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3738_2: hassa ca dhātvantassa lakāro hoti vā dahanahe vajjetvā,
anya-e0805n:3739_2: mahita”ntiādīsu pana ikārāgamena byavahitattā na bhavati.
anya-e0805n:3744_0: Atīte kāle gamyamāne sabbadhātūhi tappaccayo hoti bhāvakammaiccetesvatthesu.
anya-e0805n:3746_0: Ge sadde, gāyanaṃ, agāyitthāti vā atthe tappaccayo.
anya-e0805n:3750_0: Nata gattavināme, naccanaṃ, anaccitthāti vā atthe tappaccayo.
anya-e0805n:3752_0: Ye idha sappaccayā saddā paccayehi na niṭṭhaṃ gatā,
anya-e0805n:3752_1: te nipātanato sijjhantīti dhātvantena saha tappaccayassa cca ṭṭādesā. Naccaṃ, naṭṭaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3757_0: Sāsadisaiccetehi dhātūhi parassa tappaccayassa riṭṭhādeso hoti,
anya-e0805n:3757_2: disato kiccatakāratuṃtvādīnañca raṭṭha raṭṭhuṃ raṭṭhādesā ca honti, rādilopo,
anya-e0805n:3760_0: Tusa pītimhi, atussīti atthe kattari tappaccayo.
anya-e0805n:3763_2: puccha bhanjahansaiccevamādīhi ca dhātūhi parassa anantarikassa takārassa sahādibyañjanena dhātvantenaṭṭhādeso hoti.
anya-e0805n:3763_3: Hansassa satipi santatte punaggabhaṇaṃ kvaci ṭṭhādesassa aniccatādīpanatthaṃ,
anya-e0805n:3764_0: Ādisaddena yaja devapūjāsaṅgatikaraṇadānesu, ijjitthāti atthe tappaccayo, tassa ṭṭhādeso.
anya-e0805n:3766_0: Yajaiccetassa dhātussa sarassa ikārādeso hoti ṭṭhe pare.
anya-e0805n:3770_0: Bhanjato dhātumhā tappaccayassa sahādibyañjanena ggo ādeso hoti.
anya-e0805n:3771_0: Vaca viyattiyaṃ vācāyaṃ, avacīyitthāti atthe tappaccayo.
anya-e0805n:3774_1: Vacaiccetassa dhātussa vakārassa ukārādeso hoti vā,
anya-e0805n:3776_0: Gupaiccevamādīnaṃ dhātūnamanto ca byañjano no hoti,
anya-e0805n:3776_5: “aññesu cā”ti sutte vādhikārassa vavatthitavibhāsattā niṭṭhatakārepi kvaci vuddhi.
anya-e0805n:3778_0: Cara caraṇe, acarīyitthāti ciṇṇo dhammo, iṇṇādeso, carito vā. Evaṃ puṇṇo, pūrito.
anya-e0805n:3781_0: Bhidaiccevamādīhi dhātūhi parassa tappaccayassa inna annaīṇaiccete ādesā honti vā,
anya-e0805n:3784_11: jiyīti jīno vittamanusocati, jito vā. Dī khaye, dīno.
anya-e0805n:3788_0: Rakāro ca dhātūnamantabhūto no hoti tappaccaye,
anya-e0805n:3788_5: “Do dhassa cā”ti etta casaddena ṭo tassa, yathā – sukaṭaṃ, dukkaṭaṃ,
anya-e0805n:3788_7: “purasamupaparīhi karotissa khakharā vā tappaccayesu cā”ti khakāro,
anya-e0805n:3793_0: Nakāra makāra kakāra rakārānaṃ dhātvantānaṃ lopo na hoti ikārāgamayutte takāre pareti lopābhāvo. Agacchī,
anya-e0805n:3794_0: Nidhīyitthāti nihito, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā dhissa hi tappaccaye. Evaṃ vihito.
anya-e0805n:3795_5: apācīyitthāti pācito odanaṃ yaññadatto devadattena, pācayito, pācāpito,
anya-e0805n:3796_0: “Bhāvakammesu ta”iti ettha “ta”iti yogavibhāgena acalana gati bhojanatthādīhi adhikaraṇepi tappaccayo, yathā –
anya-e0805n:3796_2: adhikaraṇe acchiṃsu ettha teti idaṃ tesaṃ āsitaṃ ṭhānaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3796_6: Tathā aṭṭhaṃsu etthāti idaṃ tesaṃ ṭhitaṃ ṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0805n:3796_10: Nisīdiṃsu etthāti idaṃ tesaṃ nisinnaṃ ṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0805n:3796_13: Nipajjiṃsu etthāti idaṃ tesaṃ nipannaṃ ṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0805n:3797_1: Ayāsuṃ te etthāti ayaṃ tesaṃ yāto maggo,
anya-e0805n:3798_4: Piviṃsu te etthāti idaṃ tesaṃ pītaṃ ṭhānaṃ,
anya-e0805n:3798_7: Dissanti etthāti idaṃ tesaṃ diṭṭhaṭṭhānaṃ iccādi.
anya-e0805n:3801_0: Kammatthe dutiyāyaṃ vibhattiyaṃ vijjamānāyaṃ dhātūhi kattari ktappaccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n:3801_1: Idameva vacanaṃ ñāpakaṃ abhihite kammādimhi dutiyādīnamabhāvassa.
anya-e0805n:3803_1: mati budhi pūjādīhi ca ktappaccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n:3803_2: So ca “bhāvakammesu kiccattakkhatthā”ti vuttattā bhāvakammesveva bhavati.
anya-e0805n:3806_1: “budhagamāditthe kattarī”ti tappaccaye sampatte iminā kammani ktappaccayo,
anya-e0805n:3810_4: Māna pūjāyaṃ, mānito. Ci caye, apacito.
anya-e0805n:3811_0: Huto hutāvī hutavā, vuṭṭho vusita jiṇṇako;
anya-e0805n:3812_0: Pakkaṃ pakkantako jāto, ṭhito ruḷho bubhukkhito.
anya-e0805n:3813_0: Gītaṃ naccaṃ jito diṭṭho, tuṭṭho yiṭṭho ca bhaggavā;
anya-e0805n:3814_0: Vuttañca gutto acchinno, pahīno gamito gato.
anya-e0805n:3820_0: 636. Icchatthesu samāna kattu kesu ta ve tuṃ vā.
anya-e0805n:3821_1: tesu icchatthesu dhātūsu samānakattukesu santesu sabbadhātūhi tavetuṃiccete paccayā honti vā,
anya-e0805n:3824_0: Tavetunaiccevamādīsu paccayesu paresu karotissa dhātussa kādeso hoti vā,
anya-e0805n:3825_0: “Taddhitasamāsakitakā nāmaṃvātavetunādīsu cā”ti ettha “atave tunādīsū”ti nāmabyapadesassa nisedhanato tadantānaṃ nipātattaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati,
anya-e0805n:3826_5: Evaṃ anubhavituṃ, pacituṃ, gantuṃ, gamituṃ, khantuṃ, khanituṃ, hantuṃ, hanituṃ, mantuṃ, manituṃ, harituṃ,
anya-e0805n:3827_12: vinicchinituṃ, ñātuṃ, jānituṃ, gahetuṃ, gaṇhituṃ. Coretuṃ,
anya-e0805n:3828_0: Kārite bhāvetuṃ, bhāvayituṃ, kāretuṃ, kārayituṃ, kārāpetuṃ, kārāpayitumicchati iccādi.
anya-e0805n:3829_0: “Tavetuṃ vā”ti yogavibhāgena kriyatthakriyāyañca gammamānāyaṃ tuṃpaccayo. Yathā –
anya-e0805n:3835_0: Alamatthesu pattavacane sati sabbadhātūhi tuṃpaccayo hoti,
anya-e0805n:3836_0: Katvā kammaṃ agacchi, gacchati, gacchissatīti vā atthe –
anya-e0805n:3838_2: tesaṃ ekakattukānaṃ samānakattukānaṃ dhātūnamantare pubbakāle vattamānadhātumhā tuna tvāna tvāiccete paccayā honti vā.
anya-e0805n:3840_7: pāpuṇitvā. Kiṇitvā, jetvā, jinitvā, jitvā. Coretvā,
anya-e0805n:3841_0: Pubbakāleti kimatthaṃ? Paṭhati, pacati. Ekakattukānanti kiṃ? Bhutte devadatte yaññadatto vajati.
anya-e0805n:3842_1: atikkamma pabbataṃ nadī”tiādīsu pana sabbattha “bhavatī”ti sambandhato ekakattukatā,
anya-e0805n:3845_0: Sabbehi sopasaggānupasaggehi dhātūhi paresaṃ tunādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ yasaddādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0805n:3846_0: Si sevāyaṃ, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā ikārassa āttaṃ, nissāya, nissitvā.
anya-e0805n:3847_0: Bhaja sevāyaṃ, “tathā kattari cā”ti pubbarūpattaṃ, vibhajja, vibhajiya, vibhajitvā.
anya-e0805n:3848_0: Disa atisajjane, uddissa, uddisiya, uddisitvā. Pavissa, pavisiya, pavisitvā.
anya-e0805n:3849_1: atisayitvā. Ohāya, ohitvā, jahitvā, hitvā. Ādāya, ādiyitvā,
anya-e0805n:3849_3: “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā dhātvantassikāro ca, datvā, datvāna. Pidhāya,
anya-e0805n:3852_0: Dakāradhakārantehi dhātūhi yathāgamaṃ yakārāgamo hoti kvaci tunādīsu paccayesu.
anya-e0805n:3852_7: “tathā kattari cā”ti sakhātvantassa yakārassa cavaggo, bujjhiya,
anya-e0805n:3855_0: Cakāranakārantehi dhātūhi paresaṃ tunādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ raccādeso hoti vā,
anya-e0805n:3856_0: Pava pāke, pacca, pacciya, paccitvā. Vimucca, vimuccitvā.
anya-e0805n:3857_0: Hana hiṃsāgatīsu, āhacca, upahacca, āhantvā, upahantvā.
anya-e0805n:3858_0: Vāti kiṃ? Avamañña, avamaññitvā, mantvā, nyassañakāro.
anya-e0805n:3862_0: Disaiccetāya dhātuyā paresaṃ tunādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ svāna svāiccādesā honti vā,
anya-e0805n:3863_0: Vāti kiṃ? Nekkhammaṃ daṭṭhuṃ, daṭṭhā. Passiya, passituna, passitvā.
anya-e0805n:3865_0: 645. Ma ha da bhehi mma yha jja bbha ddhā ca.
anya-e0805n:3866_0: Ma ha da bhaiccevamantehi dhātūhi paresaṃ tunādīnaṃ paccayānaṃ yathākkamaṃ mma yha jja bbha ddhāiccete ādesā honti vā,
anya-e0805n:3873_1: tasmiṃ vattamāne kāle gammamāne sabbadhātūhi mānaantaiccete paccayā honti.
anya-e0805n:3873_2: Te ca kitasaññattā “kattari kita”ti kattari bhavanti.
anya-e0805n:3874_0: Antamānappaccayānañcettha “parasamaññāpayoge”ti parasamaññāvasena parassapadattanopadasaññattā tyādīsu viya antamānesu ca vikaraṇappaccayā bhavanti.
anya-e0805n:3875_0: Teneva mānappaccayo “attanopadāni bhāve ca kammanī”ti bhāvakammesupi hoti,
anya-e0805n:3875_1: tassa ca “attanopadāni parassapadatta”nti kvaci antappaccayādeso ca.
anya-e0805n:3876_7: Gacchanta si itīdha “vā”ti vattamāne “simhi gacchantādīnaṃ ntasaddo aṃ” iti ntassa amādeso.
anya-e0805n:3878_1: “sesesu ntuvā”ti ntubyapadese “vā”ti adhikicca “ntussa tamīkāre”ti takāre saralopasilopā,
anya-e0805n:3881_0: Gacchīyatīti atthe “attanopadāni bhāve ca kammanī”ti kammani mānappaccayo,
anya-e0805n:3883_1: mahatīti mahaṃ, mahanto, mahatī, mahantī, mahaṃ, mahantaṃ, mahamāno, mahamānā,
anya-e0805n:3883_3: Kammani “yamhi dādhāmāṭhāhāpā maha mathādīnamī”iti dhātvantassa akārassa īkāro,
anya-e0805n:3884_0: Evaṃ caratīti caraṃ, caratī, carantī, carantaṃ, caramāno,
anya-e0805n:3884_2: pacatīti pacaṃ, pacatī, pacantī, pacantaṃ, pacamāno,
anya-e0805n:3890_5: Setīti sento, sentī, sentaṃ, semāno, sayaṃ, sayantī, sayantaṃ, sayamāno,
anya-e0805n:3891_2: atthīti saṃ, santo, satī, santī, santaṃ, samāno, samānā, samānaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3893_3: “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā bakārassa vattaṃ, pivaṃ, pivantī, pivantaṃ, pivamāno, pīyamāno, pīyamānā,
anya-e0805n:3894_2: juhotīti juhaṃ, juhantī, juhantaṃ, juhamāno, hūyamāno.
anya-e0805n:3894_6: dvittābhāve dānaṃ dento, dentī, dentaṃ, dīyamāno.
anya-e0805n:3900_2: coretīti corento, corentī, corentaṃ, corayaṃ, corayatī,
anya-e0805n:3906_0: Bhavissati kāle gammamāne gamādīhi dhātūhi ṇī ghiṇaiccete paccayā honti.
anya-e0805n:3907_2: “na kagattaṃ cajā”ti yogavibhāgena nisedhanato “sacajānaṃ kagā ṇānubandhe”ti gattaṃ na bhavati.
anya-e0805n:3911_0: Kiriyāyaṃ kiriyatthāyaṃ gammamānāyaṃ dhātūhi ṇvutuiccete paccayā honti bhavissati kāle. Ṇvumhi –
anya-e0805n:3914_0: Kammasmiṃ upapade dhātūhi ṇappaccayo hoti bhavissati kāle ṇalopavuddhī.
anya-e0805n:3917_0: Kammasmiṃ upapade sese aparisamattatthe dhātūhi ssaṃntu māna ānaiccete paccayā honti bhavissati kāle gammamāne,
anya-e0805n:3917_8: kammaṃ karissatīti kammaṃ karonto vajati iccādi guṇavantusamaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3918_0: Atha vā “bhavissati gamādīhi ṇī ghiṇa”ti ettha “bhavissatī”ti vacanato “ssantu”iti ekova paccayo daṭṭhabbo,
anya-e0805n:3927_0: Atīte kāle, vattamāne ca gammamāne dhātūhi ṇuppaccayo hoti. Ādisaddena yu kta miiccādayo ca honti.
anya-e0805n:3928_1: karotīti vā atthe ṇuppaccayo, ṇalopo, vuddhi,
anya-e0805n:3928_15: enti gacchanti pavattanti sattā etenāti āyu.
anya-e0805n:3929_0: Marādīnaṃ panettha ṇumhi “ghaṭādīnaṃ vā”ti ettha vāsaddena na vuddhi, maru, taru, tanu, dhanu, hanu, manu, asu, vasu, vaṭu,
anya-e0805n:3932_0: 652. Khyādīhi mana ma ca to vā.
anya-e0805n:3933_0: Khī bhī su ru hu vā dhū hi lūpī adaiccevamādīhi dhātūhi manapaccayo hoti, massa ca to hoti vā.
anya-e0805n:3939_0: Samadamadara raha lapa vasa yu du hi si dā sā ṭhā bhasa bahausuiccevamādīhi dhātūhi tha maiccete paccayā honti vā.
anya-e0805n:3942_0: Masuiccetassa dhātussa sussa ccharaccheraiccete ādesā honti.
anya-e0805n:3947_0: Ala kala sala iccetehi dhātūhi la yaiccete paccayā honti.
anya-e0805n:3947_2: Kala saṅkhyāne, kallaṃ, kalyaṃ. Sala, hula,
anya-e0805n:3950_0: Tehi kala salaiccetehi dhātūhi yāṇa lāṇappaccayā honti. Kalyāṇaṃ,
anya-e0805n:3955_4: avassaṃ me kammaṃ kātuṃ yuttosīti kārīsi me kammaṃ avassaṃ,
anya-e0805n:3956_1: sataṃ me iṇaṃ dātuṃ yuttosīti dāyīsi me sataṃ iṇaṃ,
anya-e0805n:3958_1: Vajaiccevamādīhi dhātūhi paccayādesalopāgamanisedhaliṅgādividhinā yathābhidhānaṃ pabbajjādayo saddā nipaccante.
anya-e0805n:3959_1: paṭhamameva vajitabbanti atthe “bhāvakammesū”ti adhikicca “ṇyocā”ti ṇyappaccayo, ṇalopādi.
anya-e0805n:3961_1: hantabbanti atthe ṇyamhi kate “vadho vā sabbatthā”ti hanassa vadhādeso,
anya-e0805n:3961_9: sayaṃ vā saddahatīti atthe “itthiyamatiyavo vā”ti appaccayo,
anya-e0805n:3961_10: “sandhā”ti rūpe sampatte iminā nakārassa dakāro, saddhā.
anya-e0805n:3961_13: ikārāgame ca kate iminā vuddhinisedho, cariyā.
anya-e0805n:3962_2: “byañjanantassa co chappaccayesu cā”ti dhātvantassa cakāro, rucchā,
anya-e0805n:3962_21: byāpajjananti atthe ṇyamhi kate “byāpādyā”ti rūpe sampatte iminā nipātanena dyassa jjādeso,
anya-e0805n:3963_1: marati maraṇanti ca atthe iminā tyatyuppaccayā,
anya-e0805n:3963_8: Niti nicce, niccaṃ. Mā māne, māyā.
anya-e0805n:3964_0: 661. Ve pu sī davava mu ku dā bhūhvādīhi thuttima ṇimā nibbatte.
anya-e0805n:3965_2: hvādito ca yathākkamaṃ thuttimaṇimaiccete paccayā honti nibbattatthe.
anya-e0805n:3965_6: atha vā “athū”ti vattabbe saralopaṃ katvā “thū”ti vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṃ,
anya-e0805n:3968_0: Akkose gammamāne namhi nipāte upapade sati dhātuto ānippaccayo hoti.
anya-e0805n:3968_1: Na gamitabbo te jamma desoti atthe ānippaccayo,
anya-e0805n:3968_2: kitakattā nāmamiva katvā simhi kate na gamānīti atthe kammadhārayasamāso,
anya-e0805n:3968_6: Na kattabbaṃ te jamma kammanti akarāni te jamma kammaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3969_0: Namhīti kiṃ? Vipatti te. Akkoseti kiṃ? Agati te.
anya-e0805n:3971_0: Sunaiccetassa pāṭipadikassa sambandhino unasaddassa oṇa vāna uvāna una unakha uṇa ā ānaiccete ādesā honti.
anya-e0805n:3971_2: paranayane ca kate syādyuppatti, soṇo, soṇā, svāno, svānā, suvāno, suvānā, suno, sunā, sunakho, sunakhā, suṇo, suṇā, sā sāno,
anya-e0805n:3973_0: Taruṇaiccetassa saddassa susuiccādeso hoti. Casaddo aniyamattho, susu, taruṇo vā.
anya-e0805n:3975_0: Yuvaiccetassa pāṭipadikassa uvasaddassa uvauvānaunaūnaiccete ādesā honti.
anya-e0805n:3979_0: Su abhisave, “paradvebhāvo ṭhāne”ti tassa dvittaṃ, atthe abhisavetīti suttaṃ, sutraṃ.
anya-e0805n:3981_2: Vida maṅgalle, to dassa, pavittaṃ, pavitraṃ.
anya-e0805n:3986_0: Vada cara varaiccevamādīhi dhātūhi ṇittappaccayo hoti gaṇe gammamāne.
anya-e0805n:3986_7: Atha vā caranti tasmiṃ paripūrakāritāyāti cārittaṃ.
anya-e0805n:3988_0: Mida pada ranja tanu dhāiccevamādīhi dhātūhi yathābhidhānaṃ tti tiiccete paccayā honti.
anya-e0805n:3989_0: 669. Usuranjadaṃsānaṃ daṃsassa daḍḍho ḍha ṭhā ca.
anya-e0805n:3990_0: Usu ranja daṃsaiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ antare daṃsassa daḍḍhādeso hoti,
anya-e0805n:3990_1: sesehi dhātūhi ḍha ṭhaiccete paccayā honti. Usu dāhe,
anya-e0805n:3992_0: Sū vu asaiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ ū u asānaṃ ataiccādeso hoti, ante thappaccayo ca.
anya-e0805n:3994_0: 671. Ranjudādīhi dhadiddakirā kvaci ja da lopo ca.
anya-e0805n:3995_0: Ranja udiiccevamādīhi dhātūhi dha da idda ka iraiccete paccayā honti kvaci,
anya-e0805n:3996_7: Rudi hiṃsāyaṃ, ruddo, luddo, lo rassa.
anya-e0805n:3997_6: Saka sattimhi, sakko. Usu dāhe, ukkā.
anya-e0805n:3998_5: Badha bandhane, badhiro, badhirā, badhiraṃ, timiro, timiraṃ, siro.
anya-e0805n:4000_0: Paṭito parassa hiiccetassa dhātussa heraṇa hīraṇaiccete ādesā honti.
anya-e0805n:4000_2: paṭipakkhe madditvā gacchatīti atthe “kvi cā”ti kvippaccayo, kvilopo,
anya-e0805n:4006_0: Khāda ama gamuiccetesaṃ dhātūnaṃ khandha andha gandhaiccete ādesā honti,
anya-e0805n:4006_3: jātijarāmaraṇādīhi saṃsāradukkhehi khajjatīti khandho. Ama roge, andho. Gamu,
anya-e0805n:4008_3: paṭe alaṃ samatthanti atthe iminā alappaccayo,
anya-e0805n:4008_7: yadā pana sala lū lāiti dhātu,
anya-e0805n:4008_10: kuso viya lavanato vā kusena lātabbattā kusalanti appaccayena kappaccayena vā rūpasiddhi veditabbā.
anya-e0805n:4010_3: Yadā pana lā ādāne iti dhātu,
anya-e0805n:4013_0: Puthaiccetassa dhātussa puthu pathaiccete ādesā honti,
anya-e0805n:4013_7: “o sare cā”ti sutte casaddena avādeso, puthavī, pathavī, padhavī,
anya-e0805n:4015_0: Sasuiccevamādīhi dhātūhi tu duiccete paccayā honti.
anya-e0805n:4017_0: Cipādhāiccevamādīhi dhātūhi īvarappaccayo hoti. Ci caye,
anya-e0805n:4019_12: sīlādiguṇe esatīti isi. Ku sadde, kavi, vuddhi,
anya-e0805n:4019_13: avādeso ca. Ru sadde, ravi, dadhi, kuṭi.
anya-e0805n:4019_18: Juta dittimhi, joti, nandi, dīpi, kimi,
anya-e0805n:4019_24: Kapi calane, kapi, kali, bali, masi, dhani, hari, ari,
anya-e0805n:4020_0: Pāṭipadikato pana mahāli, bhaddāli, maṇi, araṇi, taraṇi, dharaṇi, saraṇi, dhamaṇi, avani, asani,
anya-e0805n:4022_2: vandituṃ alaṃ anāsannattāti atthe ūrappaccayo. Vidūro,
anya-e0805n:4022_9: Du gatimhi, dūro. Ku sadde, kūro.
anya-e0805n:4027_0: Vuttaniruttilakkhaṇānusārena “tesu vuddhī”tiādinā, “kvaci dhātū”tiādinā ca rūpasiddhi veditabbā.
anya-e0805n:4030_0: Hanaiccevamādīhi dhātūhi ṇu nu tuiccete paccayā honti.
anya-e0805n:4031_2: vāyatīti venu, veṇu vā. Dhe pāne,
anya-e0805n:4036_0: Manu pūra suṇaiccevamādīhi dhātūhi, pāṭipadikehi ca ussanusaisaiccete paccayā honti.
anya-e0805n:4037_0: Manu bodhane, ussa nusā, manate jānātīti manusso, mānuso vā, dhātvantassa āttaṃ.
anya-e0805n:4041_1: Taddhitādisutte caggahaṇena nāmabyapadese syādyuppatti, akāro, akāraṃ,
anya-e0805n:4041_2: akārena iccādi, ākāro, okāro, kakāro, yakāro, hakāro, ḷakāro.
anya-e0805n:4041_3: Evakārādīsu pana karīyati uccārīyatīti kāro saddo,
anya-e0805n:4041_4: eva ca so kāro cāti evakāro.
anya-e0805n:4045_0: Tabbādī ṇādayo niṭṭhā, tave tunādayo tathā;
anya-e0805n:4050_0: Sandhi nāmaṃ kārakañca, samāso taddhitaṃ tathā;
anya-e0805n:4052_0: Tedhā sandhiṃ catuddhā padamapi catudhā pañcadhā nāmikañca,
anya-e0805n:4054_0: Ākhyātaṃ aṭṭhadhā chabbidhamapi kitakaṃ paccayānaṃ pabhedā,
anya-e0805n:4059_0: Soyaṃ buddhappiyavho yati imamujukaṃ rūpasiddhiṃ akāsi.
